Because it requires an immense level of concentration and balance (come on, it's hot and could fall on you!), it gradually increases your dexterity. If it falls on your enemies, it's third degree burns for sure!

A hat made of many feathers and plumes, all arranged to take the shape of a peacock. It is said to carry the spirits of ancient forest warriors. So don't be surprised if you start unleashing your fury in wild cries. Just don't do it during dinner.

A solid helmet, made of an unknown and practically unbreakable metal alloy. The faceplate, as well as protecting, casts shadows over the eyes, giving it a frightening look. It is believed that the horns that adorn it are actually dragons', and guarantee unparalleled vigor and the chance to reflect magical attacks.

The Giant Hibiscus is one of nature's rarest plants. It is born when the magical energies of a plot of land give rise to an overdeveloped bud on a new moon night. Only one in three billion hibiscus has this property. Its heavy metal plate armor will suit it perfectly...

Classes: ^777777Headgear^000000

A very sturdy and lightweight wooden hat. Covered in black paint and adorned with silver ornaments, it was the symbol of the authorities in the Ayothaya provinces. Today, if you wear it, they'll tell you that carnival is too far away to dress up as a lamp...

Mask worn by one of Einbroch's main urban culture icons, Mason Maiers. Some people claim that wearing this mask while holding an axe awakens an unparalleled rage against young men! Not that you'd believe that. Right...?

A display fitted next to the user's eye, capable of capturing and transmitting a range of information about an opponent. It can measure a monster's power in numbers. The average power of an inhabitant of Rune-Midgard is 5. That of a Transclass can exceed 6,000. Beware, the power of a Lord of the Dead can cause your Tracker to explode!

Problems holding an umbrella while wielding your shield and weapons? Here's the solution! This umbrella fits over your head like a hat and protects you from the rain. You'll look very festive. Not that that's a good thing when you're facing monsters...
Reduces damage received from water attacks by 3%.
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777772^000000 Weight: ^77777710^000000

A yellow hat made of waterproof plastic that protects the wearer from the weather. Its brims are large and hold a lot of water. If you're desperate, you can turn your head in a large circular motion to splash the water on your enemies. Although you'll look like a ballerina if you do that...
5% chance of using the skill 'Water Spheres' Nv.3 whenever the user makes a physical attack.
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777774^000000 Weight: ^77777710^000000

A hat made exclusively for the third anniversary of RagnarÃ¶k Online in Brazil. Have you ever wanted a real Poring on your head?

A very cute blue cap, made in the image of the ArchAngeling, the legendary Divine Poring. Its flapping wings are exhilarating and make you want to go on new adventures! Just be careful not to let it loose, as the hat might fly off.
^FF0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be placed in the warehouse.^000000

A white scarf tied around your hair, which many women might call "fashionable". As if by magic, you'll feel lighter and much less hot, even in stuffy places. Not that this explanation will stop you from being called a "turkey".
Dodge +5, MDEF +2

5324.description:
Since they were putting all sorts of fluffy things on his head, someone came up with the idea of taking a Lady Solace and tying it over his hair. It wasn't the brightest idea of all, since carrying around that harp thing left him with quite a "burden on his conscience"...
--------------------------

--------------------------

Have you ever heard the expression 'shoot with your eyes'? Then get ready to meet the glasses that gave rise to it! With Bionic Eyes, nothing will escape your sight. Unless you WANT it to disappear, of course. With a little care, you can even fry an egg.

This is a Rental [A] item. When it runs out of time, it will disappear from your inventory.

STR +1
Type: Headgear.
Equipped with: Middle
Defense: 4
Weight: 0

Classes used: All

5329.description:
For many years, merchants have sold simple pieces of cloth as if they were the eye band worn by the famous magician Takius. Anyone who closely followed her adventures with Ronan and Yuufa knows that Takius's real headband was this one, with these special details on the ends.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

5331.description:
This is a Rental [A] item. When it runs out of time, it will disappear from your inventory.
Hat of a supreme pirate captain from the past. On a pirate ship, it represents absolute power, respected by all... until someone beats him in a duel for the hat, which seems to have happened several times with this one. That's why he's practically in tatters, after having passed through the hands of many captains. Somehow, even though it can suddenly fall apart, the hat has kept part of the essence of those captains.

INT +3

Weight: 0

A mask associated with Loki, the god of lies. It seems to whisper strange words, which ends up distracting anyone who tries to focus on you. It's perfect for playing tricks on others and not being recognized - or at least for escaping in time!

It is said that this Christmas hat was worn by the Storm Rider himself during the Christmas when he helped pull Santa's sleigh, replacing Rudolph, who had fallen ill. Perhaps that's why he's able to protect him from blizzards.
^0000ffIncreases resistance against [Freeze] by +30%.^000000
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777774^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^77777710^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5391.name: Crunch Toast
5391.description:
^0000ffRent item^000000
A delicious piece of toast for breakfast.
Max HP +100.
Chance of dropping the "Old Purple Box" item when defeating enemies.
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777771^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^77777710^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5392.name: Louyang NewYear Hat
5392.description:
A red, round hat, typical of Louyang children. This hat is a symbol of health and abundance. That's why most of the children turn out to be a bunch of little, round, red slugs like the hat itself. Better start controlling your diet...
LUK+2.
DEF: ^7777776^000000
Used in: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^77777730^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5393.name: Cupid's Tiara
5393.description:
Show everyone that you've been arrowed by Cupid! With this tiara, you'll be seized by the power of love and feel capable of the craziest things. But be careful and don't think you can take on Thanatos with just an Apprentice's Dagger...
+7% Maximum HP and SP
Cannot be upgraded.
DEF: ^7777774^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^77777720^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5395.name: Striped Hat
5395.description:
It is said that this strange top hat belonged to an enchanted cat. The cat, which looked more like a two-meter-tall Wild Rose, was constantly getting into mischief with Thing 1 and Thing 2, two strange bio-constructs. It remains to be seen whether this is really true, or whether it's just another children's story by Dr. Zeuss, a famous alchemist who loves to write in rhyme.
^0000ffVIT + 2.^000000
^0000ffAdds a small chance of dropping the Blue Grass item when killing monsters.^000000
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777776^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^77777750^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5396.name: Jasper Crest
5396.description:
A beautiful gold crown, adorned with a large reddish jasper stone. Legends say that the gem is actually the crystallized blood of a nymph, capable of making the wearer more skillful.
DEX +3, VIT +1
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777776^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^77777770^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5397.description:
A mask for divers that can also be worn on dry land if you don't mind looking like a fish out of water. Ideal for attracting attention as it's much lighter than tying a watermelon around your neck.
Byalan explorers, here's your gear!
^0000ffWater resistance +10%.^000000
^0000ffEXP when defeating Fish monsters +10%.^000000

Helmet made from a dragon skull. So hard that it can't be broken easily.
--------------------------

A mandrake has sprung up on your head. Don't even think about plucking that flower!
--------------------------

5401.name: Black Frame Glasses
5401.description:
These glasses don't have that ugly patch holding them together. They give you the respectful look of a successful intellectual. They also serve as a disguise: if you take them off, no one else will recognize you. How is that possible? Maybe the glasses don't make you any brighter, but they do make the whole world less intelligent.
INT+1, MDEF+2
Weight: ^77777720^000000
DEF: ^7777772^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

5402.description:
Protectors in the shape of fairy ears. It is said that these wild creatures still live hidden in the midst of our civilization, always playing tricks and escaping before they are seen. If you try hard enough, you can see them out of the corner of your eye.
Perfect Dodge +3
Weight: ^7777771^000000
DEF: ^7777772^000000
Equipped in: ^777777Mid^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000
Level required: ^77777770^000000

5403.name: Fresh Fish
5403.description:
It all started with a crazy adventurer in an Otter Hat who put a fish in his mouth and started clapping in the middle of Prontera Square. People thought it was funny and threw more fish at the poor guy. Today, even monsters throw fish as a sign of approval. Just remember to take it off when you go dating...

When defeating monsters:
^0000ff5% chance to drop Fresh Fish.^000000
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000

5404.description:
Ties used to secure hair. Often used by children in Juno to keep their hair from distracting them and to help them concentrate on their studies.
--------------------------

5405.description:
A hat made in the image of Filir, the most agile and energetic homunculus of all. Although he doesn't sit still on his head, his constant jumping and high-pitched wheezing help to keep him on his toes. It is said that during combat this Filir is so fast that it is able to hit enemies unnoticed, as its gentle appearance helps to catch them off guard.

5406.description:
Every adventurer learns the value of special attacks from primary school. Those who excel at mastering them receive this hat at their graduation.

Reduces the interval between casting skills by 5%.
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777773^000000

5407.description:
Every adventurer learns about the value of magic from primary school. Those who excel at using it to their advantage receive this hat at their graduation.

When casting spells, grants a 2% chance to use the "Suffragium" skill at level 1.

5409.name: Purple Cowboy Hat
5409.description:
A perfect hat for any traveler. Worn since the days when the first explorers went to the "Old West", where the ruins of the capital of Glastheim and the elven kingdom of Geffenia were to be found. It came back into fashion at the 2009 Summer Festival.
INT +2, VIT +2, SP +50
Classes: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777778^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000

5410.description:
A paper bag with holes where your eyes are. As well as being the perfect disguise for any occasion, it helps to inhibit panic attacks (both in yourself and in others, if you're very ugly). It's also the perfect solution for when you don't have time to do your hair or make-up or when you have a pimple right in the middle of your forehead. Warning: may make people afraid to approach you.
^0000ffResistance to Human and Humanoid races +4%.^000000

A hair band shaped like a strange white snake. In Kunlun it is considered a symbol of talent and is worshipped during the Silk Festival.
DEX + 2
Type: ^777777Headgear^000000
DEF: ^7777774^000000 MDEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000

5412.description:
A sweet and tasty lollipop that is often given as a reward for good behavior. Somehow, it reminds you of all your adventures and good times spent in Rune-Midgard with your friends.
^FF0000PLEASE NOTE: This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000

DEF: ^7777774^000000 MDEF: ^7777770^000000

5414.description:
Do you want to be (literally) the center of attention at the Festa Junina? This is your hat. Very useful for roasting corn, keeping friends warm during the winter nights or creating the atmosphere for telling horror stories. But watch out for the funny ones who love to jump the bonfire. We can't be held responsible for any piles received. Don't go getting hot-headed!
--------------------------
^0000ffFire property resistance +10%.^000000
--------------------------

Made in homage to the merciless god of fire, it is further proof of his great abilities. Imbued with a portion of his elemental force, it bursts into flames when worn. Faced with so much power, it remains to be seen whether you'll be able to stay in control or whether she'll be the one to control you!

These are legitimate ears with the power of fire. They make everyone envious of your strength, but you'll never know if they're talking about you or if it's the heat that makes them red hot. Don't try to set your elf ears on fire to get the same effect!

A yellow, wide-brimmed hat, symbolizing the golden autumn in style. It represents the minstrels of Rune-Midgard, especially those who love to play the song Apples of Idun, capable of creating golden apples representing the fruit of youth guarded by the goddess.

A friendly, smiling doll representing the Dokebi. He holds a sign showing his approval, to indicate that his owner is a good person. If this is true, you should be blessed with good health. If it's a lie, you risk waking up bald!

A very cute hat with a chicken nestling on its head. Sleepy and peaceful, it can become extremely furious during combat. Although she doesn't turn red and go into a frenzy, her clucking can inspire you to let out a real battle cry and strike your enemies even harder. French fries are not included.

A magnificent diadem, securely and confidently carved to honor the 10th sign of the Zodiac, Capricorn. The goat's face, carved into the diadem, has garlets, one of the sign's gems, inscribed as eyes. They carry the energy of the earth, the sign's element, to protect the wearer. In addition, the magic of the diadem rewards those who, with the perseverance common to the sign, strive to refine this zodiacal helmet.

This eye patch in the shape of a blue star was created in honor of the famous pirate mechanic, Franco. Considered a bit eccentric for wearing only a swimming trunks and modified M.E.C.H.A. parts on his arms and for loving soft drinks like Sograt Cola, Franco was SUPER thrilled when he found out that marine designer Leira was going to create an item to honor him, although he thought it would be super fun if instead of the eye patch she had created a kind of super metallic nose.

So you believed your friend when he said it would be fun to go to Lutie's and lick those metal poles shaped like licorice canes? Did you really think they were real sweets? Did it ever occur to you that because of the cold, your tongue would freeze and stick to them? Well, at least you managed to pull yourself free after five people stopped laughing to pull you in. And you don't have to worry, you're not the least bit weird, imagine that! So what, even demons are running away when they see you? Consider that a bonus, you big mouth! As your friend said, you look great in the end. And you always believe your friend, don't you?

The helmet worn by the nobleman Bate Mansamune, the powerful nobleman who helped found the city of Amatsu.
Also known as the "one-eyed bat" because he lost one of his eyes and his parents when he was still a child, this didn't stop Mansamune from becoming one of the island nation's strongest and most feared warriors.

According to a renowned Einbroch mechanic, this kind of disc was used by the advanced civilization that inhabited the site to store data and information, such as songs. Despite still being an apprentice, the boy managed to save his own father by defeating the family friend, Shame, who had turned into a zombie, and everyone believes it was thanks to the powers hidden in this equipment!

With the appearance of new fragments of the Heart of Ymir, a group of mechanics created airplanes that could be manned by a single person. This branch is a typical souvenir from the exotic and magical island nation of Amatsu, where it is also known as Anarrana, or "the flower we saw that day". They say that as long as you have this sprig, your best friends will always be with you! Maybe that's what keeps sakuras, or cherry blossoms, fresh and fragrant!

After her successful career took off all over Rune-Midgard with the show "The World is Mine" and she became Amatsu's number one muse, this vegetable became her symbol. Now you can look just like the Cinnamon Bunny, the famous character created to amuse mini-adventurers. When you hold this carrot in your mouth, you feel the strange urge to ask "what's up, noobie?" to others. That way, you feel like you'd be jumping around if you had rabbit ears too!

18684.description:
A typical Dewata peasant hat. Made especially to help build the pyramids, it makes its wearer stronger when worn.
But as the island's Buddhists believe in the idea of a sound mind in a sound body, the hat was also enchanted to increase its owner's intelligence.

18692.description:
If you wear this wig, you don't need to be told everything in Black or White or explained the ABCs of how things work. Midgard is a dark place, and it often feels like They Don't Care About Us. But even though things sometimes feel like a horror thriller, you know you can help Heal the World. All you have to do is put on your bad boy face and face the challenges! Not forgetting, of course, your style, which you have plenty of, even looking like a Moonwalker, as your friends Billi and Jean say. After all, as the wig indicates, you're a member of the musical group, Jeca are Five!^0000FFDEX + 2, LUK + 1.^000000 Type: ^777777Headgear^000000

And then suddenly, a very influential nobleman from Rune Midgard entrusted you with looking after this adorable little kitten while he went off on an important mission. And now it's up to you to look after this lazy little creature, raised on pear milk, Maltese eggs and bread with bologna. Just be careful, as it's said to turn into a real beast when it senses the presence of other animals and rowdy creatures of the Brute type.Adds 2% damage to Brute-type monsters.

Incredible! This was the red hat your mother made for you to wear when you were a child taking sweets to your granny who lived deep in the Payon Forest. She lived far away and the path was deserted, but the Wandering Wolf walked nearby. Fortunately, this little red hat already came with a special enchantment that helped you get rid of this big bad wolf by landing a dozen critical blows on his head!

Just put it on your head and you'll start chattering non-stop: "Hey, Mammonita! Hey, Mammonita! Hey, Mammonita! Mammonita! Hey, Mammonita!". Could it be carrying the Red Ruqui serum? Everyone looks at you with fear and suspicion as you walk around with that syringe in your mouth. Nobody imagines that it only has ketchup for you to put on your sandwich.

It must be funny for other people to look at you and have the impression that there's a fish on your head trying to swallow you. Luckily for you, it will never do that... They say that a feline from the Pata de Gato Corporation called Feliz caught this enchanted fish and was about to turn it into dinner when his best friend, a master called NÃ¡tiÃ§u, had the brilliant idea of turning it into a hat. Don't even think about criticizing! After all, you're the one walking around with it on your head!

Famous for her melancholy songs, Raruri is also known for insisting on crazy theories such as the existence of beings from other dimensions, time travelers in the Clock Tower or people with psychic powers such as the ability to reflect spells. Of course, the only crazy thing is that all these things exist and only Raruri doesn't realize it... In any case, the singer has turned simple rabbit ears into a coveted fashion item!^0000FFINT + 1.^000000

Despite their size, Shiba Inus are quite independent and great hunting dogs, used for finding small animals. He was such a skilled swordsman that he was able to use any kind of weapon, no matter what class it was. Had this warrior corrupted himself and brought the city to ruin? The crown still emanates a strong mysterious energy...

A cap from the Philippines that has become a trademark of the 'Jejemon tribe', a strange social group that has created a new form of Internetese. 18895.name: Heavenly Dark Flame
18895.description:
It is said that long ago, the Utan tribe worshipped an ancient deity called Tapaton. Through the sounds produced by his mystical drum, Tapaton was able to guide the Utan through various dangers until they reached the roots of Yggdrasil, where Odin was waiting for them. He needed his greatest warrior to recover a treasure lost in Thor's Volcano. So that Tapaton's strength would continue to echo in his hero's ears, Odin transformed the little deity into a pair of wings, which would crown the warrior's head and protect him from the volcano's fire. Thus the Wings of Tapaton came into being.

It is said that when his younger brother, Chun of Andromeda, was chosen to be trained by Hela, the Queen of Death, in Niflheim, Irk ended up going in his place. There, he fell in love with the young Chuna of Emerald, who strangely looked a lot like his brother. No details are known, but on his return from training, Irk had turned into a cold and heartless knight, except when he ran to save his brother or to take care of the phoenix cub on his head.

It might get cold later. Don't talk to strangers!"

Tell the truth. You just picked up a Lunatic outside Prontera and put it in your head, didn't you? Really? Oh you cute little thing!

Why simply stay warm in a wool hat when you can stay warm and look kawaii in this bunny-eared hat? Perfect for those Anime conventions in Alberta!

DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

Weight: ^7777770 ^000000

A beautiful tiara with an enchanted Galanthus flower that will never lose its grace and scent. In Arunafeltz, this outfit is called the Snowflake Tiara, which is the name by which the flower is known in the region.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

19992.description:
Everyone knows that in the kingdom of Uinterfel, everyone keeps saying that winter is coming. When he left there to become the Foot of the Port of Alberta, Ned Esterco ended up losing his mind in order to create this icy breath look and be able to use this jargon. Now you can walk as if the air is so cold you can see your breath.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Low ^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

Colorful flowers made from plastic bottles. They protect the environment and look very discreet on your head!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Environment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

19996.name: Costume Horse King
19996.description:
^ff0000This item cannot be traded.^000000
Horse mask with blue mane made for the arrival of 2014, the Year of the Horse. You feel like trotting off to find a "sexy lady" for coffee. Oppa... Oppa... be careful not to trip!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

19998.description:
A big, spiky hoof that will not only protect your neck if you get hit, but will also serve as a great weapon for anyone who comes to try your patience. Headbutt him!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20003.name: Rodent's hat
20003.description:
Someone went to the enchanted world of Rodents and brought you this souvenir! I would have preferred an action figure or something more useful, but this hat is nice and soft!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20006.name: Evil Boss Mask
20006.description:
If you plan to take over the world or enslave humanity, this is the perfect mask to do it in style! You'll even look like you're the final boss of a game or the main enemy in the story.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20007.name: Helmet of Tyr
20007.description:
There's nothing better than exploring new lands, collecting rewards and spreading Nordic culture around the world. If anyone gives you the stink eye during this journey, just give them a whack, after all, using this you can (almost) do anything.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20008.name: Costume General Helmet
20008.description:
Worn by ancient conquerors, this helmet represents courage and distinguishes soldiers from generals. The furry adornment is not just for style, representing lightness in combat and mercy towards opponents... But it's still cute.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20009.name: Elder Skull
20009.description:
Many adventurers sought to defeat the oldest dragon in the region in order to win his skull as a trophy. Tired of being the target of this persecution and using his ancient wisdom, the dragon had craftsmen make copies of his skull and distributed them as gifts to the adventurers. The texture imitates bone... please do not chew.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20010.description:
A beautiful ornament to be worn over the ears, it has enchanted jewels to absorb the sun's rays, making its metal "feathers" shine during the day as if they were alive. Ever since you started wearing them, you've been dreaming about the universe and some kind of celestial lion.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20011.description:
A beautiful crystal helmet with details in sea coral. They say it was forged by sea fairies. If you wear it under the sun, you can hear the sound of the waves. If you wear it under the moonlight, you can hear a beautiful underwater sonnet.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20012.description:
It is said that this imposing, ornate hat was made from vines intertwined by a goddess. Historians still debate whether it was worn under the sun by adventurers worshipping an owl, or at night in funeral ceremonies invoking spirits.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20015.description:
This item makes everyone who wears it look more manly and elegant. It is usually worn by the lumberjacks of Payon, but in recent years it has become very popular among young people who call themselves "ripesters".
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Low ^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20016.description:
A succulent lobster, accompanied by well-seasoned leaves and a wonderful drink. Is such a feast for you to devour? No, it's meant to make everyone's mouth water. But beware, you may end up becoming a more interesting target for the monsters...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20018.name: Attentive Ears
20018.description:
Ears alert to dangers in the vicinity. Use them to show that you're always on the lookout for monsters and loot stealers.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20022.description:
A heart-shaped and very well-filled treat. Give a cookie to the one you love!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20031.description:
Although the little standing ears indicate attention, the aim of this tiara is to be completely pompous. We're not quite sure how this happens, but it certainly has something to do with the classic mix of white, red and a little heart.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000

Be that as it may, the Alpaca Hoodie is part of her famous Crossed Animals collection and is a favorite among most of Prontera's novices, probably because it resembles their favorite mount.

Smoke in moderation or not at all. No one's choice but yours.

Congratulations, you've attracted the attention of the Splendid Ones and now, for some reason, this bright little fairy has taken a liking to you! Also known as LjÃ³sÃ¡lfar in mythology, or "luminous elf", this little Splendid will make your day brighter!

^0000ffRent item^000000

To commemorate the 11th anniversary of RagnarÃ¶k, a troupe of heroes secretly came from the ocean wearing these ears as a disguise. Led by Jorge Clone and Bread Pitty, the group also included Match Deimon, Don Xidou, Andy Gracias and the smiling Julia Roberta.

20169.name: [Costume] Little Tongue
20169.description:
A little boy used to show his mother his tongue all the time. Angry, she told him that if he showed his tongue again, she would pull it out. The little boy didn't believe her and when he showed it, his mother pulled it out and it stayed that way! That's a lie, right? It's just an accessory to wear at carnival, it's cool.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Low ^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20171.name: [Costume] Sepia Cap
20171.description:
This hat is made purely from fabric, but it has been made from a delicious tart made with a light thick cream, chocolate icing, and cookies as decoration around it. The cookies stuck around the hat are real, and the smell of chocolate makes you want to eat the whole hat.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20172.name: [Costume] Pumpkin Head
20172.description:
A pumpkin adorned with red ribbons. Your eyes will sparkle and light up Halloween night! Very elegant, it will make you the center of attention.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip with: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20173.name: [Costume] Ghost's Cap
20173.description:
A bonnet in homage to the ghost who went around asking for sweets all over Rune-Midgard. As long as there is kindness and joy in the wearer's heart, its pumpkin lantern will never go out.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20174.name: Rental Saharic Crossbow
20174.description:
A bright orange witch's hat. The pumpkin brooch flashes to prevent you from being run over during Halloween night, as you walk the streets in search of sweets in the neighborhood houses.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level : ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20175.name: Costume Diabolic Headphones
20175.description:
A cool headset with a Diabolik design. The metal frame provides great durability and the headphones are upholstered in Diabolik leather.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required Level : ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20176.name: Rental Saharic Cyclone
20176.description:
Many people know the tragic story of the sad clown Pierrot, who saw his beloved Colombina break his heart by leaving him to be with Harlequin. But did you know that the story has a happy ending, and in the end Colombina realizes Pierrot's love and returns to his arms?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20179.name: Yoyo cap
20179.description:
Look at that cap! It's almost the head of a real Yoyo! Did you know that if you tame a Yoyo and play with it, it might show you its middle finger?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20183.name: Costume Floating Ghost
20183.description:
Do you know when you're alone at home and you feel like someone is watching you? Wearing this hat will give you that feeling wherever you are!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All ^000000

20190.name: Costume Chicken Hat
20190.description:
This friendly chicken has finally found a very cozy place to nest: your tail! Take good care of her and she'll keep your head warm with her fluffy feathers.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20191.name: Doram Guard Hat
20191.description:
The first version of the Doram Guard Hat left the cute little ears sticking out, getting in the way of fighting crime. Other versions emerged, but the guard was always too busy to change. Nobody likes their ears being pulled by criminals!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20194.name: Lion costume
20194.description:
You can go roaring around like the King of the Jungle with this incredible hat that imitates the skin of a lion!
They'll hear your ROAR!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20195.name: Costume Scratching Cat
20195.description:
Your mother used to say, "Don't upset the cat", but you never listened to her. This cat has become so possessed with you that whoever manages to get it out of your face will be considered the new King of Rune-Midgard.
Mental Note: Take the cat to get its nails trimmed as soon as possible.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20196.name: Costume Leopard Ear Hat
20196.description:
A synthetic cap made in the image of a leopard's skin. Special for those who like kitty hats, but have a wilder side. Some say that if you combine it with a giant belt it becomes a marsupilam hat or something similar, but we know there's no such thing.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20197.name: Costume:Amistr Beret
20197.description:
A fashionable beret decorated to look like an Amistr, one of the alchemists' favorite homunculi. Rest assured, no homunculi were harmed in the making of this beret.
The ears and tail have been made from a fabric that imitates the fur of a real Amistr, the horns are made from acrylic and the bell is made from brass.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20200.name: Costume Rabbit Head Dress
20200.description:
Wearing this hat gives you the feeling of being in a beautiful flowery field.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20201.name: Spirit of the Banshee
20201.description:
There are people who want to get rid of a banshee and there are people who want to parade it around! With this look, you can show off the Lady of the Banshees without fear of judgment!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20202.name: Costume Deviruchi Balloon
20202.description:
This is a fun balloon in the shape of a Deviruchi that you like to carry around with you. (If only others knew that it was a real Deviruchi with whom you had made a pact. After all, what's wrong with using a little devil to try and get more cards? You don't even believe in this soul stuff...)
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20204.name: Costume Hunting Cap
20204.description:
Indispensable for hunters who spend a lot of time in the sun. You know how it is, there are some monsters that you have to wait for hours before they show up. But don't be a poser: only wear one of these if you're really going hunting in the forest!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20207.name: Costume Striped Headband
20207.description:
A bandana with a beautiful color pattern.
It gives the wearer an air of simplicity.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20217.name: Costume Veil
20217.description:
This veil belonged to the Odalisque Cheirazedo, who loved to tell the stories of the Thousand and One Nights. Stories starring Aladdin and his friends: the rich bastard Alibabon and the former slave Morgiovana, accompanied by the genie Ugh.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20218.name: Costume Spell Circuit
20218.description:
This halo proves that you are one of the chosen of the Aesir, the gods of Rune-Midgard! This means that while you're protected by Odin, you could attract the envy and fury of gods like Hela, Loki or even Hatii. On the plus side, you'll rock the club with all that mystical glitter!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20219.name: Holy Band Hat
20219.description:
This magnificent golden hat was given as a prize for The RagnarÃ¶k Voice, a musical competition held in honor of the god Bragi, in which judges Charlie Marrom, Lulu Demos and ClÃ¡udia CafÃ© selected Midgard's new musical star.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20221.name: Macabre Sale
20221.description:
The wearer of this blindfold doesn't seem to be seeing anything, but when you least expect it, a glow reveals that even blindfolded, you can see absolutely everything. Macabre, right? You can use this blindfold to scare your friends at sleepovers.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All except Doram^000000

20222.name: Costume Blue Christmas Cheer
20222.description:
A hat made by Santa's own helpers. The hat was made from blue fabric to please everyone who has this as their favorite color!
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, put on the trolley, dropped on the floor, but it can be put in the warehouse and sold to NPCs.^000000
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20230.name: Bankruptcy Mask
20230.description:
When there's some kind of end-of-year sale, shopkeepers give these masks to customers as a bonus after shopping. It's a light and subtle way of thanking them for all the money they've left behind... No use crying now, is there?
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20231.name: Costume Snowman Hat
20231.description:
Your lovely companion to cool your head on hot days, cool your neck on stressful days, freeze your neck on cold days and? decorate your head on days when your hair looks like that.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20232.name: Costume Celine Ribbon
20232.description:
Because of its immeasurable value, Celine Kimi's hair ribbon is coveted by adventurers all over Rune-Midgard. However, only those who show true determination will have possession of such a dark artifact.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20233.name: Costume Golden Angel
20233.description:
A very nice sculpture of an angel... but you'd have to have quite a skull not to be bothered by a solid gold sculpture weighing down your head. Well, maybe it can be used as a home decoration too.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20234.name: Costume Baphomet Hat
20234.description:
A perfect mask for Halloween scares or Carnival laughs. They say it was also worn by followers of a secret Templar cult, who followed Baphomet before he turned into a demon.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20235.name: Frozen Rose
20235.description:
A blue rose, frozen in the ice caves in Rachel to preserve its shape and beauty.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20236.name: Costume Archangeling Hat
20236.description:
Inspired by the legendary Divine Poring, ArchAgeling, the cap adds the finishing touch to your look. Although it only serves as an ornament, there's no denying how essential all this cuteness makes it! After all, cute is the latest fashion in Rune-Midgard.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20239.name: [Costume] Large Orange Ribbon Muffler
20239.description:
This is one of the warmest and most comfortable scarves you'll ever try. It was made in Lutie, at the Santa Claus Factory, and perhaps that's why it has an enchantment to loop around your back like a present. The ninjas of Amatsu seem to have especially loved that bit!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Low ^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20240.name: Costume Present of Snow
20240.description:
When you discovered that you had the power to make it snow around you, for some reason you felt the uncontrollable urge to run up the stairs singing "Free I am, free I am..."
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20242.name: Costume Snowysnow Hat
20242.description:
This hat is a tribute from the Bard's guild to Lutie's friendly snowman Jack Frost. As well as being warm and cuddly, it's also enchanted to make it snow around you, so you'll always remember Christmas town. Or, as some bards say in their infamous jokes, "to disguise your dandruff"... (Â¬.Â¬)
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20243.name: Costume Mint Chocolate Bonnet
20243.description:
This is the top hat worn by the eccentric millionaire owner of the famous Wootan Chocolate Factory. Willie is known for organizing crazy contests and hiring only singing pygmies from the village of Umbala, the Umba-Umbas.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20249.name: Saiyan God's wig
20249.description:
Super Saiyadin, anyone can become one. Now, to match the level of a deity, you need the power of 7 saiadim. They say that this is the only way to defeat an opponent who threatens to end the whole world!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20250.name: Sai Ajin White Hair
20250.description:
Characteristic hair of a legendary hero, Sai Ajin, who was the defender of the earth millennia ago. She was very strong and very kind, always protecting everyone with all her might.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20255.name: Costume Love Cheeks
20255.description:
There's no disguising it. This time, your cheeks are rosy not because you're blushing from embarrassment or battle, but because you're the latest person to be hit by Cupid's arrow. You only have to look at yourself to realize that love is in the air!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20256.name: Pancakes
20256.description:
What would make a better hat than a pancake? That's right, several pancakes! The dripping molasses, the butter on top and the softness make it the perfect Costume and afternoon snack. No one will believe you're eating your hat!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20257.name: Hood with rabbit ears
20257.description:
A noble and elegant look for anyone who loves wearing bunny ears as an accessory. Perfect for Easter or for that fun picnic around Esplendor.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20264.name: Vampire Mask
20264.description:
Mouthguard with the appearance of vampire teeth. It was used by exorcist monks to hunt Bomi, the Witch of the Vampire Illusion.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20266.name: Costume Secret Zipper
20266.description:
A magic zipper connected to an unknown dimension inhabited by curious rabbits. Be careful not to get the zipper caught in the animal's ear!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20267.name: Costume Penguin Cap
20267.description:
A hat made in the shape of a cute penguin.
In fact, it's supposed to look like the shape of Galapago.
------------------------
^4D4DFFIt's a gift given by Salty after accompanying Shorty on an adventure.^000000
------------------------
Type : ^777777Costume^000000
Def : ^7777770^000000
Location : ^777777Upper^000000
Weight : ^7777770^000000
Required level : ^7777771^000000
Class : ^777777All Jobs^000000

20268.name: Costume Sleep Eclipse Family
20268.description:
Shhh. You'd better be quiet when it comes to facing the monsters and conjuring up your abilities, after all, an adorable Eclipse bunny and her little Lunatic offspring have decided to sleep on your head. Yeah, your hairstyle must be really comfortable.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20278.name: Costume Man's Pride
20278.description:
Do you like Tutti Frutti chewing gum, do you like to rock out in Glastheim Prison and do you prefer a little less talk and a little more action? Then you'll love looking just like rock's greatest bard, El Vispretzel, with the help of this rebellious toupee!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20279.name: Costume Whistle
20279.description:
This mystical whistle is said to have been used by several "casters" who became famous by becoming yutubers, a clan of adventurers who love to share their opinions and reactions. When blown, instead of beeping, it says "if you like it, leave a like, share it and subscribe to the channel!"
^FF0000This item cannot be traded, thrown on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be placed in the Kafra.^000000
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20280.name: Costume Chewed Pencil
20280.description:
The perfect pencil to give you the look of an anxious person. It's already bitten by Verits, so all you have to do is put it in your mouth to make it look like you've chewed your anxiety pencil.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20281.name: Preschool hat
20281.description:
^808080A magic hat designed to protect children from the sun's rays in summer.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20282.name: White Mario cap
20282.description:
The BrÃ³der Brothers are two famous knights who started out as plumbers in Einbroch. Despite being a duo, it's undeniable that Mario, the older brother, became much more famous than his younger brother, Luis. Thus, while Mario wore a red uniform with the number 1, Luis, who wore a white one with the number 2, came to be called "White Mario". Poor Luis...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20283.name: Costume Overprotector
20283.description:
Even the members of the Church of Prontera like to be fashionable and many of the young priests have adopted cooler looks, breaking with old traditions. And hasn't the trend caught on and spread to other classes? Today, this cap is worn by everyone, even some of Freya's followers!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20284.name: Costume Cherry Blossom Hat
20284.description:
Created in homage to Amatsu, the Land of the Rising Sun, this beret in the shape of a sakura (or cherry blossom) petal even comes with the same scent as those flowers. The perfect choice for romantics, otaku, botanists or even those who are too lazy to wash their heads!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20285.name: Costume Fluttering Cherry Blossom
20285.description:
Now you no longer have to travel to the island-nation of the ninja to experience the peace and beauty provided by the "rain" of cherry blossom petals. With this magical aura, it will be as if you're carrying Amatsu with you at all times! Unless, of course, this is a side effect of being possessed by a youkai.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20286.name: Persona glasses
20286.description:
A pair of elegant glasses created by psychologist Xin Megumi Pensei. They say that whoever wears them is able to see into the spirit world and release their inner persona. So if demons cause you trauma, it's easier for you to sort out your own psyche.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20287.name: Costume Man's Golden Pride
20287.description:
Some say he's not from this planet and some say he's not dead. But whenever he had to win any musical duel, the great bard of rock, El Vispretzel, always managed to increase his ki to become the King of Rock Saiadim, making his golden tuft and his melody that much more powerful!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20290.name: Carcomida top hat
20290.description:
A hat whose top has been worn down over time, until it's a big void with a direct view of your bust. Well, at least this hat will never muffle your scalp.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20293.name: Pet Rock
20293.description:
A small, simple rock that accompanies you on all your adventures. It can be a bit heavy at first, but you'll get used to it easily, even with the occasional stones that fall into your shoes.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20294.name: Costume: Maximilian Von Babe XXIX
20294.description:
A hat commemorating the appointment of the 29th leader of the Maximilian family. A wild baby like you've never seen. It symbolizes the courage of the small over the big.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^808080Topo^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
Level required: ^8080801^000000
Class: ^808080All^000000

20295.name: Costume Poring Sunglasses
20295.description:
Some young Super Novices who haven't mastered their skills find shelter at Professor Chavier's School near Hugel. Like the young Iscote Samers, who only managed to control his Fire Spear blasts by going there and gaining this visor.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20296.name: Pet Yoyo
20296.description:
A Yoyo Monkey is a symbol of luck and hope, perfect for facing the challenges of daily life. You can pet it, play with it and even ask it for advice on which path to take. Yoyo always chooses the most fun!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20297.name: Mini Cactus
20297.description:
Mini Cactus is the quiet type, always on his own. With the exception of rare requests for water, this fellow spends most of his time sleeping, even in the midst of the most dangerous endeavors. It's a quiet and compact cactus!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

Worn by the legendary adventurer Solita, this hat is said to bring untold riches, but it is also cursed with loneliness. It certainly won't be a problem for you, a fearless person capable of facing any adventure on your own!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000

The turban is made from the finest materials: noble fabric, gold threads and the Cat's Eye Jewel and Phoenix feather for protection and luck. What's more, it's cool: you can wear it in the desert or on the beach!

Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000

A white ribbon tied in the shape of a bow that goes behind your hair. It's delicate and discreet.

A souvenir from the most paradisiacal island in all of Midgard, Jawaii. The island's artisans make dolls of various family members and this one must have belonged to a couple who have already split up.

There's no point in applying gel or trying to comb it: that lock of hair of yours will always insist on sticking up! Luckily for you, since the adventurer Coiomem Araragem recovered from vampirism, having a lock like his has become fashionable.

You've let your hair grow out and now you've decided to tie it up like that of the famous magician, Rim Tochata. Who knows, maybe you'll be able to establish a definitive contract with the Archer's sidekick and win the Holy Degree War?
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000

Balloons specially inflated to celebrate a special date: 13 years of RagnarÃ¶k Online in Brazil!

Ever since you heard the story about Rap Feet, the breakdancer penguin, you've wanted to adopt one and now you have. This playful little Pingu is your new adventure companion!

Some may think you don't comb your hair properly, but you know that having a blonde lock sticking up is actually a charm! After all, if even the alchemist Eduardo El Rico couldn't tame his unruly locks, why should you try to do yours?
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20351.name: Green lock of hair
20351.description:
You don't mind that some of the rougher people thought you had a stem on your head just because of your spiky green lock of hair. After all, you know it's your charm. No wonder you abandoned your restaurant and gym with your brothers and went on an adventurous journey with AxÃ© QuÃ©tion and Pupila to play PorinGo on your cell phone. But... what does this have to do with your hair anyway?
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20352.description:
Remember that time you drank the PX-41 potion and turned into an evil little purple minion who still loved bananas? No? Neither do I. But it might be a good excuse to justify your unruly purple locks, which are always sticking up. Better than saying you haven't combed your hair again.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20353.description:
No matter how hard you try to fix your lock of red hair, it insists on rebelling and sticking up. Not that it bothers you, since deep down you think it's cool to be a rebel like the famous swordswoman Helesiz, the leader of the Red Knights from a neighboring kingdom of Rune-Midgard.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20354.description:
Nicknamed "little antenna" by some of your friends, your lock of brown hair is always sticking up. You've been asked if it's stress, but you still remember when you tried to relax in an "onsen", an open-air spa in Amatsu, and just when you had your clothes off, you ended up bumping into the unlucky KoitadÃ´ Urashima and a terrifying flying turtle (she was actually cute). No, relaxing isn't your thing...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20355.description:
For some people, your blue lock of hair is just a "rebellious" lock. In fact, it's a genetic inheritance from his ancestor, Prince Larrau, who braved hordes of demons to become the Overlord of the underworld. That and her desire to blow up Pingus are not things to be proud of.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20356.description:
You still remember when you wanted to spike your hair all the way up to look like the sicario Ritsugaia, because you loved the ice dragon he had, called Bancay. All that remains of his "otaku" days is this unruly white lock, which he still insists on sticking up to this day.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20357.description:
Now that your hair has grown a lot, you like to wear it in a ponytail, similar to that of the young alchemist Eduardo El Rico's companion, the mechanic Uinrri Rockbella.

20358.description:
Now that your hair has grown a lot, you like to wear it up in a ponytail. Just don't go off like M and try to free other people's pets.

DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

20359.description:
Now that your hair has grown long, you like to wear it up in a ponytail, inspired by the look of the only Cyclops you've ever met, the warrior Lila, who ended up not being accepted as a delivery girl at the Kafra Corporation because of her troublesome companion, Frai.

20360.description:
Now that your hair has grown long, you like to wear it up in a ponytail, similar to that of your favorite heroes: the quiet Samurai Y, Queixinho Rimura, and the brave vigilante Yoco Rittana.

20361.description:
Now that your hair has grown long, you like to wear it up in a ponytail, similar to that of Sailor Musa's companion, the heroine Sailor Juperos.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

Now that your hair has grown long, you like to wear it in a ponytail, similar to that of the arcana Botana, the companion of Iusuco Uramexi, who helps souls pass through to Niffelheim.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

20363.description:
Now that your hair has grown out a lot, you need to put it up in a ponytail. That's because you were getting tired of people mistaking you for the villain Sephiroth when they saw your back.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000

20364.description:
Well, now you've got blonde pansies. All you have to do is choose between dyeing the ends of your locks red and blue and going to a bakery to ask for a pudding, or leaving them as they are and dressing up in a sailor outfit to go out as Sailor Musa!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000

20365.description:
Your hairstyle is ready. Now all you have to do is grab a leek and practise the lyrics to "Leva un Pokko" or the other thousands of songs sung by the virtual idol, RÃ¡tishune Meeku, because you've already got her hair!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

If your chiquinhas were a little lighter, you could even joke that you're walking in the style of Chibimusa or Magic Cassava, but that's okay, you prefer it that way, because you know that with this color your Lucky Star will be shining!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20367.description:
Apparently you've decided to do like the student Soudi Mitxuca and use powerful red mary-janes to fight evil and the Crocodiles of Comodo. After all, as Soudi himself says, it doesn't matter if you're a boy or a girl, pansies are the most glorious thing in humanity!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000

20368.description:
You don't know exactly if it's because you've started wearing these mary janes or if it's because you're evolving so much, but for a while now you've been seeing so many angels that it's getting on your nerves, and every time you see a mechanic you feel like asking him to build you a giant red mecha with the number 02 on it!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20369.description:
People may not believe it, but originally her hair and mary janes were green like those of the famous virtual muse, RÃ¡tishune Meeku. But it wasn't until winter that her hair turned blue. And only now have you understood that RÃ¡tishune and Meeku das Neves are the same person, with different hair colors.

DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000

Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20370.description:
Now that you're wearing them, just be careful if you need to wear an eye patch, because then they might mistake you for the powerful oboro Yagi Uh, from the Ranzo Academy for Amatsu shinobi, and start offering you dried squid to eat all the time.

A delicate hat, specially made to be used as a prize for participants in the famous "Spitfire of Rune-Midgard" competition. The satin ribbon and silk flower are like a crown between your locks. On the inside of the hat, in small embroidered letters, you read: "Raise your head, princess, or the hat will fall off".
