Classes: ^777777All^000000

20376.name: Lovers' clip
20376.description:
This very cute ring is used as a symbol of eternal love by many lovers who want to get away from the classic ring on the ring finger.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20377.name: Aviator helmet
20377.description:
Perfect for those of you who don't know how to fly an airplane, but have nevertheless been lost in the Morroc desert, where you met a Little Son of a King. This way you'll always remember important life lessons, like knowing that what's essential is invisible to the eye or that it's crazy to hate all the hodes because one poked you. Oops...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20379.name: Retro Watch Clasp
20379.description:
The classic pocket watch doesn't always have to be tucked away. Wearing it as a clip gives your look a refined retro touch. And as well as catering perfectly to the tastes of classic fashion lovers, it will also help those who always ask "Excuse me, what time is it?".
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20381.name: Steampunk top hat
20381.description:
This top hat represents more than a typical look for the Republic of Schwartzwald. It represents a way of life, of adventurers who seek a more technological future using the steam technology that emerged in Einbroch. You are part of this group, so much so that you named your Bear after the most famous mechanical writer of all: Jules Verme, the author of works such as 2,000 Leagues Under Byalan, Journey to the Center of Yggdrasil or Around the World in Eighty Maps.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20391.name: Silencer
20391.description:
Mask worn by Sicarians to prevent their members from spreading information about the guild.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20392.name: Patron of the Jungle
20392.description:
The combination of a hat and goggles was the solution found by the Sentinels hunting in the forest.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Glass and a Half^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20393.name: Guardian's helmet
20393.description:
Made of zelunium, this helmet belonged to the last king of the ancient capital.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20397.name: Jakk's mask
20397.description:
A magic mask that can transform you into a Jakk. The transformation is so perfect that even Jakk's friends won't notice the difference.
--------------------------
^ff0000Effects deleted at the end of the event.^000000
--------------------------
When taking physical or magical damage:
^0000ff1.0% chance to transform into Jakk for 31 seconds.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20398.name: Cursed Rabbit Hat
20398.description:
The perfect Costume hat for celebrating Halloween without worrying about all the Poltergeist Hat's equipment bonuses. Your look was so cool that all you had to do was put it on to attract the attention of a little blonde girl who smiled and looked at you. Her name was Carolina and she giggled at you, turned around and disappeared into the shadows... Wait... No! Come back! Go into the light, Carolina! Go to the light!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20399.name: Raven Tengu costume
20399.description:
This mask has a similar look to the Raven Tengu Mask, and for some reason it was used by the "Raven" gang of ninjas when they tried to take on the ninja Girayo.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20404.name: [Costume] Angelingal Blessing
20404.description:
You've clearly been blessed by the Poring family and received the gelatinous grace of the angelings and their heavenly cousins. I just don't know why, since I've seen you tear apart several innocent poporings, not to mention poor drops!
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20405.name: Eremes scarf
20405.description:
This red scarf belonged to the tormentor Eremes, when he was still alive. A victim of the Rekenber Corporation's bizarre experiments, Eremes' spirit is now one of the great challenges haunting the Somatology Laboratory.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20407.name: Aura of Fury
20407.description:
Maybe it's because he was raised by a dragon. Maybe it's because your ki is overflowing. Or maybe it's because you're too hot-headed, but you can see its fury from afar!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20408.name: Ring of Light and Darkness
20408.description:
Which is stronger, the Light or the Dark? That's the question we never get the answer to, so a very powerful wizard decided to create a diadem that could store the power of both sides. And it worked!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20414.name: Crown with horns
20414.description:
A very shiny crown, with stellar adornments that can make you see stars... as long as the red horns don't get in the way.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20426.name: Costume Grade 11 Balloon
20426.description:
A novice adventurer who began their journey in the world of Ragnarok.
Type : ^777777Costume^000000 DEF : ^7777770^000000
Position : ^777777Lower ^000000Weight : ^77777710^000000
Required Level : ^7777771^000000
Usable by : ^777777All Classes^000000

20430.name: Ethereal Skulls of Morroc
20430.description:
Ethereal skulls that mimic Young Morroc's protective aura. The purple fire of the skulls doesn't really burn. It's all a Costume illusion.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20432.name: Khalitzburg helmet
20432.description:
This was the original helmet worn by the greatest swordswoman who lived in the ancient capital of Rune-Midgard. The captain of the Order of the Khalitzburg was an expert in the use of the foil, but unfortunately ended up succumbing to the Curse of Glastheim, cast by the evil necromantic valkyrie, Himelmez.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20434.name: Guardian of hairstyles
20434.description:
You know that strong wind that messes up any hairstyle? The Hairstyle Guardian is here to help and prevent anything from messing up your style. With a very cute look, she even pampers you when you're feeling a bit down.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20440.name: Bow tie with rattle
20440.description:
A gold-plated rattle with a charming bow. And unlike ordinary rattles, this one produces a pleasant, soft melody.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Bass^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20443.name: Unicorn helmet
20443.description:
A battle helmet inspired by the magnificence of a Unicorn. Some people say that the real inspiration for this helmet was the Homunculus S, Bayeri, and others go even further and swear on their heads that it is made from dyed Bayeri hair.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20448.name: Water Bend
20448.description:
Few people know, but you are a descendant of the Northern Tribe, a nation of warriors and healers capable of making water bends, responsible for protecting the carp of Yin and Yang, representatives of the spirit of the Sea and the Moon. All that's left now is for you to find a Flying Savage to ride on its back.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20449.name: Kitten couple
20449.description:
These two "cute" kittens once stopped you in the middle of the street saying that they were mentors for the heroine Sailor Musa. Now, Luma and ArtÃªnis have decided to support you, even if what they do most is lie lazily on your head at the most inconvenient times, like when you're trying to do MVP or watch the soap opera.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20450.name: Multiclass hat
20450.description:
Although it's considered impossible in the world of Rune-Midgard, many adventurers have dreamed of what it would be like to be able to follow the path of two different classes. With this in mind, designer Peonia has created this beautiful Witch-Menestrel hat, or if you prefer, Witch-Gypsy. As a trademark, it also bears the flower after which the creative designer is named.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20451.name: Star cap
20451.description:
A super-stylish hat with a star brooch and too many props for the more discreet.
One of the favorite hat styles for singers in Kun-Pop bands, those bands made up only of girls from the city of Kunlun.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20453.name: Bale of clothes
20453.description:
Traditionally, the washerwomen in the north-east of Brasilis carry a bundle of clothes on top of their heads to the riverbanks.
This bundle of clothes isn't very heavy, but it's a great tribute.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20454.name: Queen of the Snakes
20454.description:
Gold and two emeralds adorn this crown, which belonged to the sovereign of the snakes.
It is said that the crown was a gift from Osiris.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20457.name: [Costume] Fluttering Feather
20457.description:
This prop will cause illusory colored feathers to fall around you at all times. The colorful feathers are a tribute to the endangered birds of the Brasilis fauna.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20458.name: Wild Rose Poring
20458.description:
A Wild Rose cub made friends with this little Poring and they became inseparable. Very docile and with such cute faces that it's impossible not to get attached to them. They're so cute that you'll want to put them on your head and go for a walk with your new pets.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20459.name: Colorful crown
20459.description:
The variety of tones present in this wreath is the result of the combination of several rare flowers that grow throughout Rune-Midgard. The scent is capable of bewitching any warrior and appeasing any creature, but it doesn't disguise the stench caused by a lack of bathing...
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20464.name: [Costume] Monochromatic Bows
20464.description:
Black and white bows give the wearer a minimalist look. It's light and simple.
--------------------------
^ffffff<NAVI>^4D4DFF[Fashion Shop]^000000<INFO>mal_in01,20,124,0,100,0,0</INFO></NAVI>^000000
^b4b4b4Can be exchanged for a Visual Stone Chest.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equips: ^777777Top^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required Level: ^7777771^000000
Ranks: ^777777All^000000

20468.name: Cheetah Gorilla Mask
20468.description:
This mask is based on the famous novel that tells the story of Chita, Queen of the Stone Jungle, an orphaned monkey raised by a bunch of humans in the city who ends up falling in love with a wild cuttlefish called Jano.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20470.name: Choco-Helm
20470.description:
Created by the Rocker Blacksmith with enchanted cocoa beans harvested by the Cuttlefish in the hills of the Monks' Guild, this delightful helmet serves to represent all the affection and love spread throughout Rune-Midgard during the Valentine's Day season.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20472.name: Angel's helmet
20472.description:
A helmet worn by angels of the highest hierarchy. Its ornamentation with angelic wings makes it fabulous.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20481.name: [Costume] Ifrit Mask
20481.description:
A powerful, flaming mask. Be careful where you put it on so you don't get mistaken for an MVP.
------------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20490.name: Blue Lily clip
20490.description:
The blue lily is a very rare and very fragrant flower. Be careful not to buy the counterfeit version in the center of Prontera, only the original has perfume. Refuse imitations!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20491.name: Pontaria Tiara
20491.description:
The jewel contained in this accessory, when exposed to sunlight, emits a beam of light in a straight line. In other words, it works very well for improving your aim when throwing something. Just don't look where you don't belong, otherwise this item will give you away...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20494.name: Costume UFO Poring
20494.description:
A hat featuring a Poring riding a UFO. Lights up with every step.
Type : ^777777Costume^000000 DEF : ^7777770^000000
Position : ^777777Upper ^000000Weight : ^7777770^000000
Required Level : ^7777771^000000
Usable by : ^777777All Classes^000000

20495.name: Lazy Kati
20495.description:
There's nothing like keeping your coconut warm with a little animal like this on your head. But don't even try to teach it tricks or take it for a walk: although it's so cute, it doesn't care about anything other than snuggling up to you!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level Required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

20496.name: Little Seruman Hat
20496.description:
Hat of a cute little human!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20498.name: Cute Elephant
20498.description:
What weighs more: a ton of cotton or a Cuddly Elephant? Well, the important thing is that you won't stop squeezing this hat, which has a fully functional trunk! As for the ivories... they're fake.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20499.name: Pata de Gato top hat
20499.description:
A top hat originally worn by the most successful tycoons of the Cat's Paw Corporation. It represents not only the ability to do good business, but the ability to make good friends, as the corporation's cats are known for being very friendly and sociable!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20502.name: [Costume] Mutant Bat Wing
20502.description:
Just looking at these wings makes you fear the former owner. Using one of these involves courage and a great desire to fly.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20507.name: Poring backpack
20507.description:
There's really only one way you're not going to mind when a poring picks you up and stores everything that's important to you inside, from your cards to your school supplies, without you having to turn it into a bunch of jellopys to get your stuff back: using this nice backpack!
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20509.name: Uriel's wings
20509.description:
The half-breed wings of Uriel, the flame of heaven.
Those of good character will see the wings of a beautiful bird, but those who are not just and worthy will see the wings burning with flames.
There are said to be wings of other Archangels scattered around.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20510.name: Wings of a Thousand Blades
20510.description:
A pair of wings made of thin, extremely polished blades. The material guarantees the lightness and comfort you'd expect from a lookalike; just be careful with the tips: going for a walk around Prontera during rush hour is a great way to poke others left and right.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20512.name: Hunting backpack
20512.description:
Cute and stylish, this backpack is ideal for a long journey full of adventures!
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20514.name: Sword of Thanatos
20514.description:
The legendary sword that sealed Emperor Morroc in the distant past, and which was wielded by an unforgettable hero. Just the sight of the sword can strike fear into the hearts of your enemies.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20515.name: Conjuration Circle
20515.description:
Show everyone your dark soul with this conjuring circle. Will buffs and cures have the opposite effect on you with such a gloomy look? Hmmm, there's only one way to find out...
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20518.name: Deviruchila
20518.description:
After the Inflatable Deviruchi and the Deviruchi Hat, all that's missing now is this apparatus for you to show yourself to everyone as a true follower of this dark monster. After all, where else can you keep your Deviruchi stuff? Only in the Deviruchila, of course!
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20519.name: Aura of Autumn Leaves
20519.description:
Being surrounded by nature is a unique feeling that recharges the energy expended in difficult battles. Being close to nature and surrounded by autumn leaves is twice as effective.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20521.name: Black Pussycat Meow
20521.description:
If you're really obsessed with felines, then you won't miss the opportunity to be the mother or father of yet another kitty. We promise this one won't wake you up at 3 a.m. and put on a show around the house.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20524.name: Holographic wings
20524.description:
Beautiful angel wings developed by the Rekenber Corporation. The mechanism used to simulate these wings is the same one that makes an airplane fly. In fact, what makes an airplane fly?
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20526.name: Archangel's Delicate Wings
20526.description:
^ff0000Account Bound.^000000
Wings inspired by the ArchAngeling. Its magical power is able to reflect the celestial glow, making it blue to the average eye.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20528.name: The Butterfly's Golden Wings
20528.description:
As soon as you equip those shiny wings, all the envious will want to get their hands on them. All you have to do is tell them that story you heard as a child about butterflies releasing a powder that causes blindness.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20535.name: Futuristic Hologram
20535.description:
A projection of several complex interfaces. People will probably have no idea what that means... In fact, you might not even know what all those codes and numbers mean. But it looks very futuristic and cool.
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20537.name: Dancing Leaves
20537.description:
There's nothing better than being surrounded by leaves that dance to the rhythm of the wind and paint the landscape with their stunning colors. If one falls, don't worry, there are always more leaves to compose the beautiful song of autumn.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20538.name: Rainbow circle
20538.description:
A magical and colorful circle accompanies the adventurers, illuminating the path they pass with lights of different intensities. Almost a private show, you have to be careful not to dance along.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20541.name: Ethereal Wings
20541.description:
Enjoy unimaginable powers and reach the infinite impossible with the wings of the true beings of paradise.
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Garment^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

20543.name: Haunted Poring Backpack
20543.description:
Getting into the Halloween mood, the Porings haunt the adventurers by disguising themselves as backpacks and eating all the sweets in them. You know that chocolate that's gone missing? Ask Poring!
--------------------------
^008080Displays the look on the character's back.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Effects deleted at the end of the event.^000000

One hunter gathered them together and made this beautiful accessory, to always remember the confrontation with the Giants.

31027.name: Costume Pretty Bear
31027.description:
These adorable little bear ears look like they've come straight from the forgotten stock of a Christmas store, don't they? Well, they did, but the bows are so pretty that you shouldn't even worry about when you're going to wear them. And if anyone asks, just say: 'Christmas? I've never even seen it'.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31028.name: Costume Black Cat Hoodie
31028.description:
A cuddly hooded blanket with cat ears. Made by the Pata de Gato Corporation for its loyal clientele. There are those who claim that the surplice has a deeper meaning, and that it represents the innocence of a race allied to Cat's Paw, in which humans also have cat ears, but only while they are "out of love" and haven't lost their... err... their BV.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31029.name: Costume Pig Nose
31029.description:
Do they complain when you make a mess? Then put on that muzzle and incorporate the true pig spirit, then they'll have something to complain about. Oinc, oinc!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31036.name: [Costume] Minister's hat
31036.description:
Inspired by Satto, the king of an oriental people, this hat carries the rich culture of the land of the rising sun.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31040.name: Costume Magical Feather
31040.description:
A feathered tiara that once belonged to a legendary magical girl. Some believe that its original owner was the powerful magician Sarakura Dropa-Cartas, others that it was the girl Maloka Magika. Apparently, a Novice who was in love with her enchanted the tiara to fulfill his wish and now whenever its wearer needs help, the magical girl and her crosier are conjured up.
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Temporarily disabled:^000000
^0000ffWhen using [First Aid]: Transforms into Nasarin for 10 seconds.^000000
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31042.name: Costume Survivor's Circlet
31042.description:
For those who want to cover their faces with a few pendants while avoiding a fuss, this diadem offers just the right amount of discretion and delicacy. It's like being an Odalisque, but without the part about having too many subjects surrounding you.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31045.name: [Costume] Blue Rear Ribbon
31045.description:
A delicate bow made of blue satin to be worn in the hair. The bow is adorned with the laurels of victory. Very refined and elegant.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31046.name: [Costume] White Rose Princess
31046.description:
A princess diadem adorned with white rose buds. The softness of the roses in contrast to the metal of the diadem sets a tone of elegance and sophistication.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31047.name: [Costume] First Love Cheeks
31047.description:
When your crush appears on the scene, it's impossible to control your emotions! Ignore what anyone else might think and let the passion show on your face.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31048.name: [Costume] White Lily with Black Ribbon
31048.description:
With its lush country air, this pair of lilies accompanied by brown satin ribbons exudes a strong, intoxicating perfume. Few in Rune-Midgard know the legend of the lilies of the field: according to it, this flower has the ability to reconcile separated lovers, so if you need it, don't miss your chance!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31052.name: [Costume] Alchemist Mask
31052.description:
An ancient mask that alchemists used to wear during dangerous experiments. Although it gives you a slightly sinister look, it will keep you safe from harmful gases and liquids.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31053.name: [Costume] Drooping Eddga
31053.description:
The perfect companion for a routine of indecision, The Wise Tiger gives advice on absolutely everything you do. His longevity, experience and cute hat add to the credibility of his advice.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31054.name: [Costume] Sting Hat
31054.description:
A hat made in the shape of a Sting celebrating your victory over yet another adventurer.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^808080Top^000000
Weight: ^8080800^000000
Level required: ^8080801^000000
Class: ^808080All^000000

31055.name: [Costume] Poring Bubble Pipe
31055.description:
It's said that the old magician party entertainer Ganfald created this fun toy after being cheated at a birthday party where the host disappeared without a trace. To help him relax, he made this cute little soap porring blower!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31057.name: [Costume] Eremes Scarf (Black)
31057.description:
This black scarf belonged to the Algoz Eremes, when he was still alive and in his gothic phase. A victim of the Rekenber Corporation's bizarre experiments, Eremes' vengeful spirit still roams the dark corridors of the Somatology Laboratory, but there you'll find him wearing his classic red scarf.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31058.name: [Costume] Chewy Gelato
31058.description:
The world's most famous ice cream trio! Composed of Strawberry, Cream and... Chocolate? Where's the chocolate? WHERE'S THE CHOCOLATE?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31059.name: Sailor Hat
31059.description:
Cap made of cotton known to be widely used by sailors as part of their uniform.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

A beautiful tiara decorated with starfish found on Lasagna beach.

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31061.description:
Two crustacean claws inspired by our beloved Vadon. How many times have you visited Byalan today?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000

Level required: ^7777771^000000

31062.description:
A wig inspired by the Homunculus S Eleanor. Although they look very realistic, the hair is synthetic and no Eleanor was harmed in the making of this wig. The little black ears are made of felt and give the wearer a very cute look.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31063.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Blue)
31063.description:
It shines and vibrates like the blue of a vast ocean. It makes you want to take a dip, or sail the seven seas and explore uncharted waters!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31064.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Red)
31064.description:
For those days when you've woken up on the wrong foot and you're raging to defeat a thousand Porings. Wear this red bun to show that you're not messing around!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31065.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Yellow)
31065.description:
Not all that glitters is gold - it may just be someone very stylish who has decided to wear this pair of beautiful golden buns, made to accompany you on a bizarre adventure.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31066.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Green)
31066.description:
Green like nature, these ornaments complement the look of a spring lover who wants to make a living from art.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31067.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Black)
31067.description:
The ideal accessory for any occasion that's a little more macabre: masquerade costume parties! Halloween! Baphomet-worshipping sacrificial rituals!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31068.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (White)
31068.description:
The purity of the white in this pair of buns reflects the wearer's peace of mind. An adventurer wearing the Pure Bun wants no war with anyone!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31069.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Brown)
31069.description:
If you've ever wondered what color a donkey is, your doubts are over - it's the color of this bun here. But no judgments, OK? This color is not... Unusual. No, it's not. Not at all.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31070.name: [Costume] Hair Buns (Purple)
31070.description:
If someone sees you wearing one of these, they will already know that you enjoy or are involved with esoteric themes. Perhaps black magic and invocations, or maybe just reading signs and astral charts.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31087.name: [Costume] Dwarf Beard
31087.description:
A faithful model of the beard of the ancient Vikings. Although they were always equipped with heavy clothing, weapons and armor, the robust beard was always their great symbol of strength and seriousness, as well as a tradition passed down to their beloved sons.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31089.name: [Costume] Exploding Wave
31089.description:
Have you ever looked at someone and thought "what's going on in their head?". Well, in yours it seems that lately it's anger that's calling the shots. Maybe it's because you're embodying the fury of the old shuras and it's even reflecting in your ki. I wonder where your joy went?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31091.name: [Costume] Show Me The Zeny
31091.description:
Golden blessings all around! If you want a shower of gold coins, this is your chance to wear this look and try your luck at Mega & Cena!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31092.name: [Costume] Rabbit Ribbon
31092.description:
It's a tremendous privilege to be able to wear one of the most popular hats among rabbits. Only the dukes and duchesses of carrots were so lucky with their looks. If that doesn't guarantee you chocolate eggs, nothing else will.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31117.name: [Costume] Hoplite Helmet Gold
31117.description:
^ff0000Account Bound.^000000
A helm used in ancient western country that was famous for close formation and tight defense.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Position: ^777777Top, Mid, Lower ^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31118.name: [Costume] Assassin's Skull Mask
31118.description:
Mask worn by a villain who torments a bat hero wandering through the night. It was originally black, but ended up discolored after coming into contact with chemicals present in the terror gas.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31119.name: [Costume] Blue Magician Hat
31119.description:
A classic cone-shaped hat, but one that contains a very strong arcane power imbued in its fabric. With this iconic wizard's garment, you can shape reality, teleport far away and, perhaps, even hide inside it.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31120.name: [Costume] Vampire Familiar
31120.description:
You were careless and ended up being bitten by Dracula! But look on the bright side: now that you're an immortal vampire, you're learning to turn into a bat and fly around. In exchange, you'll have to drink blood and lose your humanity. But what is a human anyway? Just a miserable little pile of secrets.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31121.name: [Costume] Bat Stole
31121.description:
A stole with Incubus demon wings attached to it. The small skull brooch completes the look which, despite the soft gothic air, is only a prop for those who follow a dark style.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31122.name: [Costume] Bloody Vicious Stop Bandage
31122.description:
A red bandage like that, which fits perfectly on the head... Perfect for going up to people and scaring everyone by saying you've been "lightly scraped" on the head!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31123.name: [Costume] Ghostring Tall Hat
31123.description:
The Phantom Top Hat is the only one that scares people in an elegant and careful way. It's that story: ask first, scare later. The scare isn't always successful, but it's a hat-trick... or a hat-trick.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31124.name: [Costume] Ribbon Chef Hat
31124.description:
Also known as "toque blanche", this chef's hat is only for those who can make a wonder of Ragna cuisine with just one egg and three jellopies in fifteen minutes. You can even take part in RagnaChef!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31125.name: [Costume] Queen Anz Revenge
31125.description:
Some say that this hat was worn by the legendary King of Pirates, D. RogÃ©rio. Others say it was the hat of Captain Malvida, the Most Beautiful Pirate in the World. Whatever the case, it's undeniable that this is one of the most imposing pirate hats on the seven seas!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31132.name: [Costume] Christmas Wreath
31132.description:
A garland made of holly branches.
You can hear the bells ringing somewhere.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31138.name: Piamette Red Hood
31138.description:
Famous for her childish temperament, little Piamette has had several versions of her hat replicated, but none of them in red! Show off your love of red with this unusual hat.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31141.name: Cactus Flower Corsage
31141.description:
^808080A corsage shaped like a cactus flower. It's as beautiful as a real one.^000000
Class: Costume
Position: Upper
Weight: 0
Required Level: 1
Required Jobs: All Jobs

31143.name: Florivela
31143.description:
An aromatic flower that should be lit and taken to as many places as possible. Everyone who smells it falls asleep and dreams of great adventures. The last adventurer who decided to light it slept so much that he woke up with a hot head... in the burning sense, really.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31149.name: [Costume] Nydhog Wig
31149.description:
Now you can parade around Rune-Midgard with a beautiful hairstyle just like Nidhogg's. Err... no! We're not talking about dragon horns and scales (although there are a few), but the splendid hair of the humanoid form of the guardian of Yggdrasil.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31151.name: [Costume] Chaser Ear
31151.description:
"Oh, how I wish I were a cat," said a 21st century thinker. Well, thinking about how common this desire must be in Rune-Midgard, this pair of fluffy ears was made especially for those who, from time to time, would like to have the good life of kittens.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31155.name: [Costume] Spinning Eyes
31155.description:
The main part of the uniform of the Rekenber Corporation's most senior guards. When you wear one of these, you can pass into the Regenschrim laboratories without question.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31158.name: [Costume] Squirrel Ear Hat
31158.description:
Not only does this hat have adorable squirrel ears, it also has a long, fluffy tail! The hat is said to be a tribute to a certain squirrel girl who managed to defeat the great villain Dhanos.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31159.name: [Costume] Jormungandr Head
31159.description:
This hat represents the terrible serpent Jormungand, also known as the Midgard Serpent, because it is so large that its size circles the entire world. According to legend, it is Jormungand who will kill Thor in the final battle of RagnarÃ¶k.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31160.name: [Costume] Rune Helm
31160.description:
A golden helmet adorned with wings, precious jewels and inscribed with runes. Despite its sturdy appearance, this helmet is quite fragile and is just a fashion accessory. This helmet is made for those who like a more classic look.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31162.name: [Costume] Shaving Foam
31162.description:
Magic Foam was invented to satisfy the cravings of children who couldn't stop eating sweets. Over time, it ceased to be a healthy option and everyone was consuming it. Today the foam is a nostalgic and rare product.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31164.name: [Costume] Brown Stole
31164.description:
For some reason you think this plaid overcoat goes perfectly with a Detective Hat. Perhaps it's because the famous detective Xerloque Rolmes wore exactly this "uniform" when it came to solving the most gruesome crimes in Prontera.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31165.name: [Costume] Piggyback
31165.description:
What adventurer hasn't dreamt of picking up a little child, putting them on your shoulders and then setting off on crazy adventures to face Emperor Morroc or defeat Baphomet and his little puffins? Whether it's your little boy or an "orphan" you found in the Prontera market, now you can teach a little boy everything he needs to know to become an adventurer as responsible as you!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31166.name: [Costume] Teddy Bear Hood
31166.description:
Almost a "kigurimi", this is a warm and cuddly hoodie that will make you feel like a teddy bear! Don't worry, wearing this hoodie won't make you evolve into an Ursoringo.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31167.name: [Costume] Happy Droopy Lunatic Ears (Black)
31167.description:
A black version of the beaded accessory created by the Humanities staff at Juno University. Used especially for deconstructing paradigms and when studying hard. Wow...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31168.name: [Costume] Mouton Life (Blue)
31168.description:
The name might imply that they are ear muffs for a shepherd to put on his flock of sheep so that they don't get frightened by the howls of the Sentinel Worgs, but in fact they are muffs made of fluffy wool with decorations in the shape of little ram's horns. Capricorns go wild!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31172.name: [Costume] Los Pollos Locos
31172.description:
A huge turkey costume head. The size may be a little uncomfortable for walking around in tight places or in the middle of a crowd, but the laughs you'll get will be worth it. It is recommended that you don't press your head into the back, otherwise it will make an annoying noise!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper, Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31176.name: [Costume] Always Watching
31176.description:
Soft and cuddly, this teddy bear beret is ideal for fans of a more kawaii look, as the young people of Amatsu say.
You feel as if the teddy bear is watching you all the time. Legends say that when your energy runs out, the cuddly Freddy Tazbear comes to life to haunt you.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31177.name: [Costume] Tail Hat
31177.description:
With an appearance that imitates natural elements - such as the petals of a flower and the wings of a butterfly - this hat represents the great and generous Mother Nature, whose power permeates between love, delicacy and strength.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31178.name: [Costume] Fire Muffler
31178.description:
This scarf will set your look on fire with its extravagance. But you'll soon learn to adjust the temperature, and you'll be able to walk around warm and cozy (and stylish!).
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31179.name: [Costume] Wolf Masquerade
31179.description:
Carlos Roberto MÃ³ Brega was invited to a masquerade costume party and thought it would be a brilliant idea to dress up as a wolf in sheep's clothing. So he went to the old lady in Prontera Square, who sews costumes, to order his costume. For some reason, she understood
that he wanted a Wolf in Musketeer's Skin. In any case, he spent a long time sitting on that bench, in that square, laughing.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31180.name: [Costume] King Sura Headband
31180.description:
A track that has become a meme, that is, a trend in Prontera. Originally, it belonged to the handsome, skilled and perfect shura, Rodrigo Rilberto, that man of the cloth who, in addition to never having lost a battle and having dropped all the MVP cards first time (including in Thor), built a wooden house for his son's amusement and was the only one in Rune-Midgard who managed to complete the Level 11 Cookbook quest.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31182.name: [Costume] Side Cap
31182.description:
This little hat brings with it many stories of the famous sailor Omar. They say he preferred a darker color than the classic white worn by his comrades, and was brave for going against the rules. Even in retirement, we know that his exploits made him the Brave Omar of all.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31183.name: [Costume] Fallen Angel's Blessing
31183.description:
Someone got tired of the concept that everything "angelic" has to be in light colors, so they painted these wings in an unusual color.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31184.name: [Costume] Eye of the Hawk
31184.description:
Once a hawk decided to use an eye patch to give its prey a chance. The result was that he ran into a tree and could no longer fly. He then started sending replicas of the accessory all over the kingdom, encouraging good wing-flapping practices.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31185.name: Costume Engineer Cap
31185.description:
All aboard the Rune-Midgard Express! Choose your seat and take a trip from Bragi Alvim to Jardim Prontera for lots of drops and XP. Choo choo!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31186.name: Costume Black Cat
31186.description:
Now you have a pet kitten. And you swear he can talk! According to the kitty, his name is Chalem, and he's actually a 500-year-old sorcerer who was imprisoned in the form of a cat by the Wizard's Guild as punishment for trying to take over the world... Can you get a cuter pet than that?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31187.name: Costume War Princess Ribbon
31187.description:
A bow that in no way imitates the look of the famous Warrior Princess Chena. All right, maybe you're too young to know who Chena the Warrior Princess is, but if you'd met her like I have, you'd know that, even wearing this bow, she'd still say, "IIIALALALALALALA!"
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31188.name: Costume Mono Gothic Bonnet
31188.description:
An essential accessory for those who enjoy the gothic-lolita fashion launched in Amatsu. Known there as part of the "kawaii style", this fashion is a fusion of gothic style and clothes inspired by the classic Victorian and rococo styles of the Midgard continent.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31189.name: Costume Red Cat Ears Cape
31189.description:
A surplice with a hood with kitten ears, made by wrestler and fashion designer TaocacÃ¡, who takes part in the Azulblaz wrestling tournament. This version is inspired by Lutie's fashion and, as usual with the designer's garments, the hood has kitten ears.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31190.name: Valkyrie card
31190.description:
A mini hat worn only by the most stylish Valkyries. If you thought they were just Freyja's pretty little faces, know that Valkyries are people too, and people with very good taste in fashion, for that matter!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31193.name: Ahat hat
31193.description:
The Manuks' belief in the sovereign beauty of Minister Ahat led them to create a kind of hat totally inspired by him. Totally, because you'll have a miniature of the minister on your head, which also changes its appearance according to your gender.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31195.name: Costume Mini Chocolate Hat
31195.description:
^ff0000Account Bound.^000000
A little hat made of milk chocolate.
Not made for eating~!
--------------------------
Effects below only available during the event
--------------------------
^0000ffEXP when defeating monsters +7%.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes:^777777All^000000

31197.name: Costume Egg Crispinette
31197.description:
Used in arid climates, the Sand Hat goes perfectly with any style and is always in fashion. Too bad it doesn't protect against sand in the eye... Not everything is perfect, right?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31199.name: Bifurcated goatee
31199.description:
Who knew that your mother was right and that if you ate jellopy you'd grow facial hair? Look on the bright side: now you can parade around with a nice goatee, taking advantage of the fact that beards are in fashion! And you don't even need a razor to shave it off. Practical, isn't it?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31200.name: Costume Wrapping Ribbon
31200.description:
A pink bow with very long ends, very reminiscent of the bows worn by Sylvians, the pet dogs that the Splendids capture and train in Alfheim. You only found out about this after meeting young Affe Ketchup, a trainer from the city of Palleta who was always running around with a little Picky called Chu.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31201.name: Costume Royal Rabbit Crown
31201.description:
Despite its name, this crown may not be the biggest, but it will certainly add a "touch" of importance to your presence - as long as you hold your head high, of course. Don't lower your head or the crown will fall off!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31202.name: Little Seruman's cap
31202.description:
What a delightful hat. Originally worn by the officers of the Canine Travelers' Guard found in Eclage, this hat has become a craze among adventurers who for some reason like to break chains and hunt down nasty demons. Or maybe run away from them.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31203.name: Costume Charcoal Stove
31203.description:
ChurrasquHelm, the barbecue helmet is one of the first incredible inventions created by the Rekenber Corporation using futuristic Verus technology! Perfect for those with hot heads who are always buzzing with ideas.
^FF0000Please note! The item cannot be traded, put in the cart, sold to NPCs or thrown on the ground, but it can be placed in the Kafra .^000000
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31208.name: Long blonde hair
31208.description:
You've finally let your beautiful locks grow out and now you're the owner of a vast blonde mane... Even if it's just a wig! Okay, it's still not as long as Rapunzela's, but one day you'll get there. Perfect for those who don't want to disguise themselves as a priest to win over that beloved swordsman.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31209.name: Long white hair
31209.description:
You've finally let your beautiful locks grow out and now you're the owner of a vast mane of hair... Even if it's just a wig! If you've always wanted to look like the yokai warrior Inu Se Acha, the leader of the Hawk Gang, Graffite or the famous troublemaker Black Gatuna, this is your chance.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31210.name: Costume Side Pigtail (Blue)
31210.description:
You can be the blooming spring itself with these pigtails made from Rune-Midgard's most special flowers. They'll always smell good and are sure to make your day more colorful.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31211.description:

31215.description:
You can be the blooming spring itself with these pigtails made from Rune-Midgard's most special flowers. They'll always smell good and are sure to make your day more colorful.

You can be the blooming spring itself with these pigtails made from Rune-Midgard's most special flowers. They'll always smell good and are sure to make your day more colorful.
