31217.name: Costume Side Pigtail (Purple)
31217.description:
You can be the blooming spring itself with these pigtails made from Rune-Midgard's most special flowers. They'll always smell good and are sure to make your day more colorful.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31218.name: Sky Unicorn Tail
31218.description:
The exotic blue of these locks represents the infinity of the skies on a beautiful afternoon. And don't worry: that's just the name of the hairstyle; no unicorns have been mistreated!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31219.name: Ruby Unicorn Tail
31219.description:
Ponytail? Not at all, this is a Unicorn Ponytail! The intense red of this hair will show everyone your euphoric and optimistic personality.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31220.name: Gold Unicorn Tail
31220.description:
Now you know that unicorns have longer tails than horses. Put on this golden hairstyle and show the world that you've come to shine and be number one!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31221.name: Lemon Unicorn Tail
31221.description:
Despite its name, equipping this item doesn't mean you're a sourpuss who has a bad attitude towards everything and everyone. If life hands you a Lemon Unicorn Tail, use it!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31222.name: Choco Unicorn Tail
31222.description:
Sweet as Sniquers, this is one unicorn tail you'll want to have - especially if you're a major chocoholic!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31223.name: Snow Unicorn Tail
31223.description:
Light, discreet and elegant. It's also the perfect excuse to ask your friends to "respect your gray hair".
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31224.name: Bronze Unicorn Tail
31224.description:
A beautiful long, tanned lock. Just don't forget to always walk in the sun, because those locks will shine brightly in the light!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31225.name: Lilac Unicorn Tail
31225.description:
From 0 to 10, this accessory scores 11 for extravagance. Travel the four corners of Rune-Midgard sporting this purple hair and attract everyone's attention!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31226.name: Costume Long Twin (Blue)
31226.description:
Wonderful appliquÃ©s belonging to a very successful digital singer in Amatsu. Her royal blue color reflects her fame as a music queen.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31227.name: Costume Long Twin (Red)
31227.description:
Giant mary janes who are well known by an Amatsu celebrity. The intense red hair shines brightly in the spotlight!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31228.name: Costume Long Twin (Yellow)
31228.description:
A golden hairstyle that will make you look fabulous from head to toe. Gold represents first place, and that's where you belong.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31229.name: Costume Long Twin (Green)
31229.description:
A pop star from Amatsu set the trend and now everyone wants to wear this shade of green. Don't be fooled by the name "natureba"; this one is for insiders only!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31230.name: Costume Long Twin (Black)
31230.description:
Did you want a more modest version of the Miku Wig? We're sorry! This may be a more discreet color, but you'll still catch the eye of Odin and the world!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31231.name: Costume Long Twin (White)
31231.description:
Real hipsters will love this variation of the Miku Wig. We know that platinum hair is a tedious and difficult process to do properly, so enjoy these hairpieces!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31232.name: Costume Long Twin (Brown)
31232.description:
Show all your support and unconditional love for Miku with a more discreetly dyed wig that doesn't give up all the eccentricity of this fabulous long hairstyle.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31233.name: Costume Long Twin (Purple)
31233.description:
Do you want to arrive? To be noticed by everyone and everything? Then this is the hairstyle for you! With such an "I've arrived" tone, this wig will send out the message that you've arrived to cause a stir.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31241.name: [Costume] Cheerful Sun
31241.description:
A brightly shining sun that floats above your head.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31245.name: Costume Bell Flower
31245.description:
A small hair ornament made with flowers that represent spring.
A bell is attached to add a touch of cheerfulness!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31246.name: Costume Hummingbird
31246.description:
A bird that can mimic and reflect spells cast on itself.
However, it sometimes messes up the incantation.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31247.name: Chapopotamus
31247.description:
No one can resist the cuteness of a hippopotamus. Its sparkling eyes light up hearts and its big teeth remind you to include fruit and vegetables in your shopping this month.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31248.name: Pointed red prop
31248.description:
Ears up and red? It can only be a sign of confusion! Whoever wears these ears certainly has no fear of attracting danger... or of being danger itself.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31249.name: Costume Hopping Rabbit
31249.description:
A very warm and comfortable hat, based on Louyang folklore. There, it is believed that a large rabbit lives on the moon, pounding a pestle of rice to make dumplings for the goddess Chang'e. I wonder if that's why in Rune-Midgard we call the bunnies "lunatics"!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31250.name: Costume Wonderful Beast Ears
31250.description:
Use these little ears to show that you're a lovable cutie at first glance, but can turn into a creature of destruction and horror at any moment. It's like that Ispilberg movie...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31251.name: Costume Cat's Mouth
31251.description:
You've tried everything, but the world of artistic makeup just isn't for you? No need to get frustrated - with this item, the nose and mouth of a cute kitten will magically appear on your face! It'll intrigue everyone, but so what? It's so cute.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31252.name: Costume White Cat Ears Hat
31252.description:
A hat belonging to an old man known for adopting every cat he saw on the street - it was said that he lived with 120 cats in his house. Living with cats even made him grow cat ears!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31255.name: [Costume] Melon Helmet
31255.description:
Heavy and inefficient helmet, but with a pleasant melon smell.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31256.name: 50 Real Mask
31256.description:
Want to catch someone's eye? Dress up like a 50-real note and parade around feeling wanted! Just be careful not to disappear mysteriously...
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31259.name: Costume Bubbly Arc Angeling Hairband
31259.description:
Some ArchAngelings got together in this tiara because they wanted to get out of the ordinary and enjoy some adventures. They always wait for someone who has the courage to take them to the most challenging battles.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31260.name: [Costume] Sophisticated Tracker
31260.description:
A new Tracker model designed by a brilliant scientist. She has made some changes, such as adjusting the language to suit the user and a more powerful system. This way, the chances of it exploding will be minimal when you come up against an enemy whose power is over 8,000!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31261.name: Sour Lemonade
31261.description:
Whoever named this lemonade "sour" used the diminutive to soften it.
Made with the juice of 7 lemons, this drink will make you contract muscles in your face that you didn't even know existed!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31262.name: Disposable glasses
31262.description:
^ff0000Will be removed after the event.^000000
--------------------------
Goggles with technology to give you the feeling that things are really real.
--------------------------
^FA4E09Set^000000
^fa4e09[Popcorn Bucket]^000000
^fa4e09[Limonada Azedinha]^000000
^0000ffDROP rate +15%.^000000
^0000ffIncreases movement speed.^000000
^0000ffFlavored Popcorn healing effectiveness +200%.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31263.name: Popcorn bucket
31263.description:
Carrying a bucket of popcorn with your hands can be a big problem, but not for the genius who came up with the brilliant idea of putting the bucket on top of his head!
This way, he can hold the remote control with his right hand and his big guy with his left!
--------------------------
^CD3278During the event:^000000
^0000ffAll attributes +5.^000000
--------------------------
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31295.name: Feathered Beret
31295.description:
A beret worn by the staff of an old train station in Rune-Midgard. All you had to do was ask them to carry your luggage and they would fly off to the desired location. Fast, efficient and completely winged.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31298.name: Crooked beret
31298.description:
If they tell you to fix your crooked beret, tell them it's a charm! Between falling and not falling, this one prefers to be in doubt.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31299.name: Costume White Rabbit
31299.description:
A cuddly rabbit full of soft fur, whose yellow color has been rumored to bring wealth. Superstition or not, this companion is sure to bring good times to your adventure!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31300.name: Costume Warm Cat Muffler
31300.description:
You used to have a long white cat called the Long Cat who was a big hit on the interwebs. Over time, other felines appeared, such as the Queborda Cat or the famous Staple Cat, who always looks angry. Without the attention of the interwebs, you decided to tie your cat around your neck and go outside. At least he's warm.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31301.name: Wink
31301.description:
You can't stop noticing how everyone you pass is reacting. Some people look at you suspiciously, some people seem shocked or even offended, but at least you're getting some naughty smiles and winks in response. And to think that all this was because you were staring in amazement at a sandy man who was upwind...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31302.name: Costume Black Magenta Ribbon
31302.description:
An accessory that's very much in keeping with the personality of the standard soft goth: it doesn't reflect any light, but it's basically quite nice.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31303.name: Hot LÃ¡men
31303.description:
A delicious bowl of oriental noodles. The filling is very reminiscent of Summer Festival Lasagna!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31308.name: Protective feathers
31308.description:
A sturdy tiara adorned with a pair of feathered wings. Although it serves as protection, the purpose of this tiara is purely Costume.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31318.name: Costume Gerhard Von Deviruchi 83 Years
31318.description:
An adorable Deviruchi that is at least twice the size of your head. It follows you everywhere, swinging back and forth, filled with helium gas. But don't even think about deflating it just to suck the gas out and walk around with a funny voice.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31319.name: Festive Fan
31319.description:
^0000ffRent item^000000
Green wooden fan. Use it during the Noodle Festival to take advantage of its special effects!
--------------------------
^0000ffSkill Delay -5%.^000000
^0000ffAttack speed +5%.^000000
--------------------------
^FA4E09Set^000000
^FA4E09[Cata-Vento Festivo]^000000
^0000ffFixed casting -0.2 seconds.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31320.name: Festive weather vane
31320.description:
^0000ffRent item^000000
Tiara with a red weather vane. Wear it during the Noodle Festival to take advantage of its special effects!
--------------------------
^0000ffSkill Delay -5%.^000000
^0000ffAttack speed +1.^000000
^0000ffAttack speed +5%.^000000
^0000ffPhysical and magical damage against Fish +10%.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31321.name: Bright sunflower
31321.description:
It could be an ordinary sunflower, but this hat reflects the sunlight and shines as brightly as the rays. Whatever that means.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31324.name: DJ Kitty headphones
31324.description:
One of Comodo's biggest stars, DJ Kitty, has a range of her exclusive headphones on sale for a limited time! Are you going to miss out?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31325.name: Costume Queen Scaraba Helm
31325.description:
When a Scaraba Queen resigns, her crown is buried in the darkest corners of the Kamidal Tunnel. What they didn't count on was that archaeologists would soon find this place in their excavations, which would make this accessory very fashionable among adventurers.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31326.name: Mini BafomÃ©
31326.description:
Watch out for the mini sickle! Watch out for the pointy little horns! The Mini Baphomet is cute, but just as dangerous as its normal version. Feed it, brush its fur and let it swing its scythe. A happy little puffball is no trouble to anyone!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31327.name: Costume Wood Goblin Nose
31327.description:
Use this and you'll look like that wooden boy who told a lot of lies. The one everyone's a fan of!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31328.name: Stylish eggshell
31328.description:
An apprentice got hold of an eggshell, but found it very dull and decided to give it a special touch. He painted it blue and added a few dots. The result was so cool that everyone started copying the idea. It became a trend! So, are you going to miss out?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31329.name: Costume Alice Wig
31329.description:
A wig that perfectly simulates the hair of the Alice monster. Don't worry, no Alice was harmed in the making of this wig. It's the perfect disguise for sneaking into the Kiel Hyre Academy Robot Factory and blending in with the other Alices.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31330.name: Costume Fallen Angel Valletta
31330.description:
An accessory that combines the best of both worlds: this look is 50% bow, 50% wing. 50% cute, 50% dark. But without a doubt, 100% stylish!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31331.name: Costume Green Maiden Shinyon Cap
31331.description:
A delicate cotton accessory used to secure hair in buns during battles and prevent it from falling in your face. This Bao Bao is a replica of the same hair bun accessory used by the Green Maiden. Very useful and super stylish!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31332.name: Costume Black Khalitzburg Knight Helm
31332.description:
The helmet of the captain of the Order of the Khalitzburg, which once shone a vivid blue. The curse of the necromantic valkyrie Himelmez took not only the life of the entire order, but also the original color of this helmet.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31368.name: Bonfire
31368.description:
To keep the flame alive, this hat is fed on high-quality logs, purchased from the Willows in Payon.
The bonfire is the symbol of the June Festivities, but be careful not to burn yourself!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31372.name: Kafra Bianca
31372.description:
Cloth doll inspired by the most gossipy Kafra in the Kafra Corporation! Be careful when walking with it on your head, the doll is light and can move at the slightest movement.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31379.name: Costume Clock Winding Key
31379.description:
There's nothing better than winding up your thoughts! With the Spinner, any absurd idea goes away in a few spins. However, bear in mind that spinning faster doesn't make you a genius... but it does mess up your neurons!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31380.name: Gossip Crow
31380.description:
People don't want to hear the latest gossip? No problem! Tell it all to the Gossip Crow. This bird knows so much that sometimes it seems to have three eyes...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31381.name: Costume Diabolic Lapel
31381.description:
This collar carries an air of mystery and darkness, and its adornment is of unknown origin. It is believed to have belonged to a monster so evil that putting it on will make you feel like a true dark lord.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31382.name: Costume Punkish Cat Ears
31382.description:
Whether it's the chill of fall or the cold of winter, a cap with long cat paws is comfortable, warm and different. And if you're bored, you can play with your paws, but if the freezing wind hits, you can use them to cover your face better. The true meaning of "combining the useful with the pleasant"!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31383.name: Costume Volume Low Twin
31383.description:
This blue wig is the latest addition to the Waifu wig collection, developed by the famous Amatsu hairdresser Delso Kamyura. Specially made to order, these completely silky wigs will make everyone believe that you are the promised Waifu sent by the gods.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31384.name: Costume Fake Ears
31384.description:
These are actually very discreet ear plugs. Ideal for looking like you're listening to the lecture you're being given or that you're finding the class interesting.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31385.name: Companion pumpkin
31385.description:
The Halloween tradition has been taken a little more seriously with the Companion Pumpkin. Now you don't have to wait until costume night to see one of these... Just don't bother with a talking pumpkin accompanying you everywhere.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31386.name: Costume Survivor's Orb
31386.description:
Just as planets orbit around the Sun, these artifacts will float around you. What could be greater proof than this that you are the center of attention, of life, of the universe and everything else?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31387.name: Jakk Adventurer
31387.description:
It's Jakk with an underdeveloped body.
He can't move, but that doesn't stop him accompanying you on your adventures.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31389.name: Costume White Bird Rose
31389.description:
Accessory used by the messenger Hermes on his journeys.
Type: ^7777Costume^000000
Equipped with : ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Nv. needed: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31390.name: Costume Let It Snow
31390.description:
^ff0000Account Bound.^000000
A hat made from the hopes of people in places where it doesn't snow during the winter. Snow falls like a blizzard.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31391.name: Costume Floating Sage Stone
31391.description:
You may not be the center of all attention, but at least you're the center of this crystal's orbit. What's more, this is a beautiful artifact to make you a truly enlightened presence!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31393.name: Costume Vajra
31393.description:
The vajra represents the spiritual balance achieved by reaching nirvana. It's definitely NOT meant to be held in the mouth, but you laugh in the face of the teachings and want to look cool at all costs.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31394.name: [Costume] Master White Arcanist
31394.description:
A fun and funny hat, inspired by an old story about a loving and simple father who worked hard during the day, but when he got home, he would dress up as a magician to cheer up his daughters and show them that they would always be protected by his magic.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31395.name: Costume Book of Magic
31395.description:
A series of elemental books that float around you, so that you always have at hand the knowledge of how to handle fire without burning your cloak or conjure gusts of wind without blowing your hat off.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31396.name: Costume Sorcerer Hood
31396.description:
Wearing this hood is undeniable proof that you are part of the select Dark Club. A shiny jewel adorns the tip of it, because no matter how much you love the dark, a light will guide your way on your midnight gothic strolls.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31397.name: Costume Sitting Pope
31397.description:
A little doll made in the image of one of Arunafeltz's symbols of faith. Now you don't have to go to Rachel's shrine to ask for her blessing. Just as well - it was a lot of fun, wasn't it?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31398.name: Bored blink
31398.description:
Did they steal your kill on the map again? Lost your MVP again? Killed over 1000 bugs and no card? Then this item is for you, to express how you're feeling...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All except Doram^000000

31399.name: Veil of Dawn
31399.description:
Ornamented with precious jewels, this veil was once worn by Milena the Odalisque. It was said that on her adventures, she would stay up all night just to applaud the sunrise.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31402.name: Green Apple Crown
31402.description:
Look, it's understandable that the Green Apple Crown is extremely exotic and stylish, but the last adventurer who wore it was mistaken for target practice and took an arrow. Raise your head or the crown... I mean, lower your head, please!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31405.name: Eleanor's Golden Wig
31405.description:
Why wear a regular wig when you can wear a gold one? Seriously, it's much cooler and doesn't fall into the same old same old. Oh, and the little ears come as a bonus!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31406.name: Nidhogg's Platinum Wig
31406.description:
Did you think Nidhogg wouldn't go platinum? You thought wrong! Just put on this wig and you'll feel like walking around with this beautiful platinum hairstyle, asking people if they can find a "nub on your lace".
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31407.name: Alice's pink wig
31407.description:
A new shade of color for those who love Alice's long hair. The only problem is that blending in with the other Alices at the Kiel Hyre Academy Robot Factory will no longer be possible...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31413.name: Bull ornament
31413.description:
Representing the magnificent constellation of Taurus, this adornment was created by the stars for those who possess strength.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31415.name: Pilgrim's Hat
31415.description:
A hat worn by pilgrims when traveling in forbidden lands. It covers the wearer's eyes to prevent them from seeing the giant stone creatures that roam the desert paths.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper and Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31416.name: Seraphim clip
31416.description:
Hair ornament with blue rose details. The feathers represent a Seraphim, an angel with six wings commonly seen in the Temple of Odin.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31419.name: Flap Flap Tiara
31419.description:
Wings go up and down with this tiara. Be careful not to get caught in the wind and fly away!
------------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31432.name: Costume Floating Ice
31432.description:
Magical fragments of icy rock. They were found in the core of the Ice Cave on the outskirts of Rachel. Equip them to freeze your opponents!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31433.name: Costume Astro Circle
31433.description:
Inspired by a mother's agape love for her children, the Benevolent Halo is a symbol of maternal understanding, care and affection. Delicate and shiny, this item carries the image of pure and zealous love, leaving you surrounded by a protective aura.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31435.name: Costume Magician Knit Hat
31435.description:
The premium wool and double stocking stitch make this beanie a very warm, durable and, above all, stylish accessory. It's a very common fashion item among adventurers who go to Starbonks for a Poringccino or two.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31437.name: Costume Baby Penguin
31437.description:
This adorable penguin is perfect as a faithful companion. No matter where you go, it will always be by your side; what better loyalty than that of an animal that will give up the coldest places just to be with you?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31438.name: Costume Fluffy Angel Cape
31438.description:
A warm coat, perfect for when you need to take a quick walk in the cold. What's more, with these colors and the stitching, it'll probably stay in fashion for a good few winters to come.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31439.name: Costume Fluffy Heart Earmuffs
31439.description:
These muffs will warm your ears in the same way your heart does when you think of your sweetheart.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31440.name: Polar Bear Cap
31440.description:
Cute and cozy, the Polar Bear Cap is indispensable for comfort during cold periods. The cotton retains heat and the silk gives the item a cozy look. No polar bears were harmed during manufacture.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31441.name: Penguin
31441.description:
Penguins can't fly and are a bit clumsy, but they make a great hat theme! This particular one was offered by unknown travelers who claimed to come from icy, distant islands. Just for the record, it's made of plastic.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31445.name: Costume Feather Fedora
31445.description:
Complete your Comodo tourist look with this extravagant hat. Visit this bustling city, enjoy the clubs, the nightlife and bet all your chips in the casino!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31446.name: Little Liar's Syringe
31446.description:
A syringe with a mysterious red and yellow liquid inside. There are many doubts about the real contents of this syringe... Is it a virus from the Umbrella Corporation? Is it some kind of serum to become a super soldier? Relax, it's just strawberry juice with mango juice.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31448.name: Sting bow
31448.description:
Cute bow tie worn by Sting, the nicest giant hand in Glastheim! Don't worry about the smell of sewage, this bow tie has been washed more than 50 times!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31449.name: Flowered eye patch
31449.description:
A beautiful bright blue rose can draw more attention than the most beautiful eyes. It covers half your vision, but gives you twice as much style.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31450.name: Costume Lolita Two Side Up
31450.description:
The famous hairdresser from Amatsu, Delso Kamyura, has launched another wig from his collection. This time, it follows the "ombrÃ© hair" style, going from blonde to pink. With wavy, silky strands, this wig is a real scandal and a real charmer.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31451.name: Costume Blue Frill Ribbon
31451.description:
A light blue bow with a few white stripes and small laces around it. Delicate and charming, it will keep your look discreet and simple.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31452.name: Costume White Cat
31452.description:
Despite not having a moon on her forehead, this cat is extremely adorable and cuddly. When she wants affection, she rubs against her owner's legs until she gets it.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31453.name: Costume Large Ribbon Muffler (Black)
31453.description:
If winter has arrived and you were still missing a big, warm and stylish scarf in your inventory, now you don't have to! Wool on the inside and velvet on the outside, this scarf makes you feel very cozy, and with this color you no longer have the excuse of "it doesn't go with anything".
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31455.name: Costume Super Cute Dog
31455.description:
WOW, you can't seem to get cute memes out of your head. That's okay, because now you don't have to search the internet for images of catiorines.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31457.name: Husky cap
31457.description:
The cutest puppy headdress you've ever seen! In addition to the cap, the designer also made the front paws to give the idea that the puppy is resting deliciously on your head.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31459.name: Bonbon hat
31459.description:
The perfect helmet for you, who are a sweetheart! Also great for racing on Al De Baran's Turbo Track, especially if you try to use some bug to run over a soda fountain while dropping menthos into it.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31461.name: Blue Poring Earrings
31461.description:
Small earrings inspired by the monster Porings, which is where the blue color comes from. Come on... if a poring is blue, isn't it called Marin?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31462.name: Pink Poring Earrings
31462.description:
Small earrings inspired by the Poring monster, which is where the color pink comes from. Wait... isn't every poring pink?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31463.name: Costume Flying Drone
31463.description:
Made in Einbroch, this little robot is always agitated, on 220 and never gives up trying to bring more humor to his adventures. Sometimes, when leveling up, he even says something like "Plift, ploft, still! You've reached a new level!".
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31465.name: Egg carton
31465.description:
One day, the mother of a little adventurer asked him to go to the market in Prontera and get a carton of eggs. The little adventurer, a little inattentive, got things mixed up. At least he came back with a fashion piece...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31466.name: Angel Wings Egg
31466.description:
Eggshell with angel wings. Some blessed being must have hatched from that egg.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31467.name: Demon Wings Egg
31467.description:
Eggshell with demon wings. Some cursed being must have hatched from that egg.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31472.name: Costume Fairy Feathers
31472.description:
A pair of delicate wings whose size fits your ears perfectly. The flowers of this accessory exude a fragrance that will accompany you wherever you go - even if you go to the most putrid sewers of Glastheim.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31473.name: Costume Tipsy
31473.description:
These marks indicate that you've done something that makes you uncomfortable and you've been found out. Well, as long as you didn't take your friend's equipment, it's all good! Just don't go too red, eh?!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31474.name: Costume Straight Long (Black)
31474.description:
You've finally let your beautiful locks grow out and now you're the owner of a vast black mane... Even if it's just a wig! If you've always wanted to feel like the legendary fire-bending warrior Sailor Arte, you can't go wrong with this wig!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31475.name: Ears of the Cunning Fox
31475.description:
When any little animal stands on its head, you know something is coming... These fluffy ears indicate danger and add a special charm. It's almost like a sixth fashion sense.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31476.name: Blossom Hat
31476.description:
As well as protecting your beautiful hair, the Blossom Hat blooms more and more with every ray of sunshine it receives. Without even realizing it, you'll have a whole garden on your head, no exaggeration! Okay... maybe a little.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31479.name: Infinity Projection
31479.description:
If you can't go to the universe, take the full infinitude of the cosmos to yourself. Perhaps you could even be considered a marble astronaut... Just don't forget to report your situation to Major Tom!
--------------------------
^008080Displays graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31480.name: Sleeping Gioia
31480.description:
A Gioia is usually quite aggressive, but this one is the complete opposite: it follows you wherever you go while you sleep peacefully. Just be careful not to wake him up from his delicious nap.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31481.name: Gatoneco
31481.description:
A kitten so small it fits in your mug! Now try to balance the two on your head without breaking the mug or hurting the poor kitten.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31482.name: Costume Lunatic Muffler
31482.description:
They found a way to replicate all the fluffiness and comfort of the Lunatics' fine fur without even having to hurt one of them in the process. Who would refuse to feel the softness of the gods on their neck all day long? Only a true lunatic!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31487.name: Pirate Eye Patch
31487.description:
Perfect for sailing the seven seas with a loyal crew under your captaincy. May the wind be in your favor in the search for gold!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
DEF: ^7777770 ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31488.name: Costume MVP
31488.description:
You always thought MVP stood for "Most Valuable Player", right? Actually, the acronym stands for "Least Shameful Possible" (a lie), and reminds you that you did no more than your duty to win that MVP with that many Acid Bombs you used.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31489.name: Costume Bouquet Hat
31489.description:
Delicate like garden flower arrangements, this hat brings the elegance of the countryside directly to your look. The oversized bows add to the grace of a hat that smells of roses.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31490.name: Costume Poring Muffler
31490.description:
At first glance, it looks a bit too weird and gelatinous for a scarf, but don't let first impressions put you off. With the texture of a Poring on the outside, it fits perfectly around your neck, and on the inside it's lined with a very warm and cozy wool. Double advantage!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31491.name: Costume Orange Tabby Cat
31491.description:
A beautiful yellow feline who will follow you wherever you go. But her name already gives away her fame - this kitty will be after food all the time!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31492.name: Costume Cat Ears Cape Brown
31492.description:
Made by the talented Doram, the Feline Shoulder Pads are very warm and offer unprecedented comfort. Don't be alarmed if the shoulder pad purrs. It's just an exaggerated differential to increase immersion.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31493.name: Costume Volume Low Twin (White)
31493.description:
Delso Kamyura's collection never stops! Inspired by the authentic celebrities of Amatsu, the hairdresser presents his newest completely platinum wig. He has also taken great care to leave the strands strong and silky, bringing Amatsu's charm to all of Rune-Midgard!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31504.name: Costume Large Hungry Fish
31504.description:
It may seem strange from the outside, but the Chapeixe has a number of features that get rid of the bad smell. In addition to peeling once a year and changing color, which is super trendy, it moisturizes the hair with a natural fish oil. Only a catfish head wouldn't use one of these...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31505.name: Costume Falcon Mask
31505.description:
Let others know you as the fearsome Adventureus Rapinum: a rare and imposing specimen of hawk characterized by its unparalleled speed, overwhelming strength, keen eyesight and? extremely fast metabolism? You'd better learn to balance your meals with your journeys so you don't get an unwelcome surprise...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid and Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31506.name: Costume Cat Eared Bandana
31506.description:
A very popular fashion accessory in Malangdo. There's even a space to cover your ears if you're a Doram. If you're not, it's just a little charm.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31508.name: Pointed blue prop
31508.description:
Blue ears always bring an air of calm and tranquillity. Whoever wears these ears is certainly in good spirits and doesn't give a damn about the kingdoms. The important thing is to look good in the photo!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31509.name: Costume Fawn Ears
31509.description:
Nobody takes the Fierce Little Ears very seriously... With a name that differs from the feelings they provoke, they have become accustomed to being squeezed by other people's hands because they are so cute. Over time, the little ears have understood that perhaps the best cuddle is a fierce hug.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31510.name: Costume Short Haired Cat Ears
31510.description:
Short hair is just as beautiful and stylish as long hair. That's why this wig has a very different and modern look, with two imitation kitten ears. Be aware, however, that you might be mistaken for a famous character from Amatsu.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31511.name: Costume Long Haired Cat Ears
31511.description:
A beautiful completely platinum wig with small braids and bangs. The strands of the wig themselves imitate kitten ears, and some say you'll look like the yokai warrior Inu Se Acha!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31512.name: Costume Tuxedo Rabbit
31512.description:
Unlike all his siblings, this bunny was born spotted, with a mix of black and white. Because he's out of the ordinary, he's always on the lookout to make sure he doesn't get a bargain.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31513.name: Costume Black Rabbit Ears
31513.description:
If other people ask you why you dress like a rabbit, ask them why they dress like humans. If they know as much about movies as you do, they might understand what you mean.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31516.name: [Costume] Mini Melon
31516.description:
A small melon that looks like the real thing, but is light and fluffy enough to put on top of your head.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31518.name: Bouncy popcorn
31518.description:
At a popcorn party, the pot is the catwalk! The popping signals the party and the smell of butter whets the appetite for new journeys. If all adventures were as hectic as Dancing Popcorn, there would be plenty of legends to tell.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31519.name: Photogenic LÃ¡men
31519.description:
A hat prepared to be perfectly "instagrammable"! The Hashis are already up in arms about taking the best photo possible! All that's left is for them to invent the camera in Rune-Midgard!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31527.name: Wing clips
31527.description:
Set of magic wings to decorate the hairstyle. No birds were harmed in the making process. The downside is that any wig flies off.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31528.name: Costume Stardust Hairband
31528.description:
Straight from outer space, this tiara has a look that is sure to make you a real star among adventurers. Its tips are adorned with stars, which have met by chance of fate.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31529.name: Costume Happy Rabbit Ribbon
31529.description:
The creator of this bow tie wanted to keep the pattern of lowered ears and cute props, but her fan club was clamoring for something different. So she opted for pointed ears and beautiful hydrangeas on the sides.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31531.name: Costume Lovely Heart Cap
31531.description:
The hat that Sarakura Dropa-Cartas won after sealing the Gemini card. It may not have the power to duplicate things or people, but there's no doubt that it will make you look twice as good.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31533.name: Costume Warm Black Cat Muffler
31533.description:
This Gatchecol is here to prove that all cats bring good luck to their owners. Its color variation is purely intentional, to show that it doesn't matter which feline warms your neck, but rather the style and love involved.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31534.name: Colorful Tiara
31534.description:
More beautiful than the stars, the Colorful Tiara leaves a vivid trail of joy wherever it goes. Remember to clean it once a day to keep it sparkling!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31536.name: Pet Beelzebub
31536.description:
Pet Beelzebub gives advice on difficult decisions during the adventure. He's also not noisy and doesn't make a mess... Looking at it from all sides, you can only see advantages!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31538.name: Aura of Love
31538.description:
If you love drowning your friends with "Loves" on their posts, now is the perfect opportunity to take this behavior beyond social networks.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31540.name: Costume Red Gemini Eyes
31540.description:
The Gemini-S58s are always wandering around the Somatology Laboratory, constantly changing into different beings. The only way to find out if they really were a fake was by the color of their eyes. But now that there's a color-matching lens, there's no way to tell when there's an impostor in our midst...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31542.name: Costume Clay Poring Jar
31542.description:
Do you think Porings are so cute that you want to keep them in a jar? Well, with this vase, you'll come very close to making that a reality!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31543.name: Costume Siorava Hat
31543.description:
Just put it on your head and all the comfort and cuteness of this cute hat will make you feel like a real teddy bear. Just make sure they don't squeeze you too tightly!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31544.name: Costume Piamette's Curls
31544.description:
To look like the mighty MVP, you don't need a creepy stuffed animal or her clothes and gadgets. Just put on the blonde, curly wig that has been made exactly to match Piamette's hair, and that's it! Just as adorable and dark as she is.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31545.name: Costume Eremes Scarf (Blue)
31545.description:
Although Eremes' spirit was full of frustration and anguish, this scarf was worn when he was in a cheerful and colorful phase. And alive, of course.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31546.name: Costume Clockwork Cap
31546.description:
With all the replica berets being sold to visitors to the Clock Tower, the site guides had to change the shade of their own clothing. Red and white won by one vote... The other option was a very eye-catching neon yellow.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

^ff0000Account Bound.^000000

31559.description:
Used by the Royal Guardians, this rosary is the symbol that helps warriors in times of danger. It is made purely of silver and has a small ruby in the center, which represents the heart and courage. Watch out for fakes!

The Mitra is a hat used in sacred rituals to reinforce worship. Wearing it would not only make you look very important, it would also prove that you have faith in what you do.

Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000

Level required: ^7777771^000000

A pair of wings for the head that burn eternally in black flames. Not recommended for people with hot heads.

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000

Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000

Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31565.name: Costume Crowned Princess Ribbon
31565.description:
A union of beauty and authority. Show everyone that you not only have good taste in cute things, but also the power and authority of a member of the royal family!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31566.name: Costume Stole of Dominion
31566.description:
Silky and comfortable, this stole is similar to the one worn by divine emissaries. The Poporing ornament is there just so you don't get mistaken for a real heavenly envoy, after all, they would never waste their time with dolls (but if you're reading this, you probably would).
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31567.name: Costume Sheep's Horns
31567.description:
Maybe you love sheep and think they're cute. Or maybe you like cults and dark rituals involving long-horned animals... These are very conflicting opposites. No one will know if you're a cute person or a dark one!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Required level: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31568.name: Taiji Spirits
31568.description:
With origins in Kunlun philosophy, these spirits represent the harmony of the world: good and evil, full and empty. Balancing these forces is the way to reach your Chi's full potential.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31569.name: Costume Open Air Headset
31569.description:
The perfect accessory for audiophiles: crystal-clear sound, high volume without distorting the instruments, and perfect bass and low end. All without having to worry about wires! You can't complain about technology when there's such a marvel, can you?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31570.name: Futuristic display
31570.description:
To let go of the past, you need to look to the future. The Futuristic Viewfinder is essential if you want to take a good look and not miss out on any opportunities that life may throw at you! The laser beam function is a bonus in case the future doesn't work out.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All except Novice and Evolution^000000

31571.name: ChipÃ©u
31571.description:
Hm... Connections: right; Thermal paste: right... ChipÃ©u has been widely used to speed up the user's thoughts, while at the same time strengthening the ability to process ideas and the number of brain nuclei... Man, that's crazy!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31572.name: Costume Mobile Pursuit System
31572.description:
As well as being a beautiful accessory, these haloes have a number of useful but cool technologies, such as telling bad jokes and an alarm that tells you when you need a haircut. Rumor has it that in the next update you'll even be able to play Ex-Kairi!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
DEF: ^7777770^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31573.description:
These Robot Kitten Ears come straight from the industrial era, proving that technology can replicate even the cutest Costume gadgets. Far be it from us to say that they're cooler than ordinary kitten ears (but they are).
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

This communicator makes it possible to contact civilizations from the past and the future, giving you all kinds of knowledge about history. But be careful, if you use it for too long you'll go cybernetically insane.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

A beautiful wig in a very soft shade of turquoise, but very beautiful. If you want to get technical, this color has several fancy names: Tiffany Blue. Mermaid. Summer Breeze. Use them to impress your friends and show how much you know about fashion.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31580.description:
Two corn and sweet potato skewers that go very well with the FogarÃ©u.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

It has all the advantages of a Poring Scarf: warm and lined on the inside, jelly on the outside... Except that it's green! Who wouldn't prefer green to pink?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31588.description:
Whoever wears the Blizzard Tiara is immune to the cold and doesn't need to wear heavy coats. This basically makes you invincible on frosty mornings... but takes away the pleasure of hot tea.
--------------------------

Used a lot when the Morroc region suffered from violent sandstorms. You weren't there when it happened and you still want to wear one of these to play old school? Poser!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000

--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31595.name: Student hat
31595.description:
It's not known who started the rumor that if you carry books around in your head, you learn faster. But it soon spread and everyone started doing the same.
No one has ever confirmed whether this crazy method works for learning anything, but wouldn't it be easier to read the book instead of carrying it around in your head?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Someone thought it would be a good idea to put a mini-ecosystem in a hat. It's kind of comfortable, but first you'll have to get used to the dew falling from the leaves, the bees buzzing in the flowers, the butterflies flying around and the spiders in their webs.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

This hat was made to commemorate the growing number of little fish that have escaped extinction. It's obviously made of plastic.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Level required: ^7777771^000000
