31655.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for your Ladyship, who is pure phyneza (with PH and Y!) and wants to shine with a beautiful bun wherever she goes.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31656.name: Coque Veraneio Vert
31656.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for your highness, who cares about the environment and animals. You even stopped using plastic straws long before everyone else!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31657.name: Veraneio Noir Coke
31657.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for your magnificence, who has hair as dark as night and likes to go on gothic trips.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Bass^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31658.name: Coke Veraneio Blanc
31658.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for your omnipotence, which has taken on gray hair as part of your experience and knowledge as a veteran adventurer.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31659.name: Veraneio Brunne bun
31659.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for royalty who just want a charming, discreet bun to take the edge off the heat.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31660.name: Violette summer bun
31660.description:
An exquisite hairstyle that guarantees style even on those hot days when the weather gets stuffy and everything sticks to you. The color is perfect for your majesty, who likes to flaunt everything - her achievements, wealth and even the eccentric color of her hair.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31664.name: Head Wolf
31664.description:
A cute little wolf who makes everyone sigh with cuteness... until he starts barking for hours on end.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31667.name: [Costume] Poring Beret
31667.description:
Porings are cold and icy. This beret is the complete opposite, with a warm and cozy interior to withstand even the coldest winds. And it still retains all the cuteness of the Porings!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31668.name: Majorur horns
31668.description:
They say that this pair of horns once belonged to a real Majorur. They also say, however, that no monster of this species was defeated in the production of this look. If all this is true, one can only draw one conclusion: somewhere in this world, at this very moment, a "de-horned" Majoruros is being made fun of by its friends.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31670.name: Costume Miyabi Doll Hair
31670.description:
A beautiful head of hair from Miyabi Ningyo. Put on your obi and take a little bit of Amatsu with you wherever you go! Just don't forget that she's the easiest monster to defeat that drops Ruby Violins, so it's best not to go overboard with the costume, because if they mistake you for one...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31674.name: Bemol beret
31674.description:
The name of this sought-after Mythical hat will be the envy of those on the white soil of BraSIlis.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31684.name: Costume Kururinpa Tails
31684.description:
Adopt this fringed and braided hairstyle that has quickly become the biggest trend Amatsu has ever seen.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31686.name: Costume Desert Wolf Baby
31686.description:
Being followed by a pile of fluffy fur is really quite special. The feeling of cuteness isn't so constant, though, as there are occasional bites on the heel... very painful, in fact.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31687.name: Costume Alchemist Bag
31687.description:
A very nice little handbag. Its potions compartments are great for when you need to throw a Greek Fire in the face of the first monster that comes to bother you!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31688.name: Costume Poring on Shoulder
31688.description:
Have this little companion on your shoulder at all times. And when you want it, just keep it in your trouser pocket, because it's so small. What could be more practical than this?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31694.name: Porings red card
31694.description:
A letter addressed to King Poring. I hope it's good news and not some bill to pay.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31698.name: [Costume] Red Riding Hood
31698.description:
A bonnet that belonged to a little girl who loved taking sweets to her grandmother. It is said that she gave up this life after being attacked by an Eddga in the middle of the road. So you know: avoid walking through forests...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31699.name: Happy Eyes
31699.description:
Sometimes we don't need to smile with our mouths, our eyes already tell us we're smiling.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All except Doram^000000

31700.name: Scarf of the Brave
31700.description:
Whoever wears this scarf, however fearful they may be, automatically becomes braver and is able to carry out the most challenging tasks without flinching. Just don't take it off in the middle of the mission...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31710.name: Florist's hat
31710.description:
This white hat is adorned with beautiful, freshly picked flowers. They are said to have belonged to Mel, but ended up flying off her head while she was picking flowers from her garden.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31711.name: Crown of Kings
31711.description:
The crown worn by the three great Magi.
They were known for giving expensive gifts: Gold, Incense and Armor Scroll +11.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31712.name: Respirator
31712.description:
Mask with particle filter to avoid inhaling dust and smoke.
You can wear it around toxic people too.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31713.name: Bark hat
31713.description:
The shell of a nutmeg that has been cut in half and the inside removed to fit your head.
Whoever wears it often hears the phrase: 'You're a nutter, aren't you?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31715.name: Carrot Rabbit
31715.description:
A little bunny called Carrot who loves fruit and vegetables. Coincidentally, he doesn't like carrots very much. Could it be because of his name?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31716.name: Crimson Pupils
31716.description:
How about giving your look a makeover? Very nice, right? These beautiful Crimson Pupils add a special touch to your outfits!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All except Doram^000000

31717.name: Wavy blonde wig
31717.description:
A beautiful light blonde wig, great for enhancing your outfits and matching with that wonderful dress you have in your closet!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31719.name: Fold of Fire
31719.description:
Controlling fire with the power of the mind is a feat that few can achieve. In addition to its immense power, it has many uses. You can light the barbecue in style and you'll never need wood on the fire.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31721.name: Summoning Drums
31721.description:
All it takes is a few beats on these drums in the right rhythm to awaken Raijin, Amatsu's god of thunder, in his dragon form. If you find his presence a bit... "I've arrived", you can put him back to sleep and just enjoy these beautiful percussion instruments.
--------------------------
^008080Displays a graphic effect that can be turned off with /effect.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31728.name: Novice's hat
31728.description:
It's no easy task to dress in a calm and pleasant way, but it's even better with the Novice Hat. It's so peace and love that no monster will attack you. Just don't test it, okay?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31729.name: [Costume] Miracle Plant
31729.description:
Wherever you go, roses and lilies will guide you. Tulips and daffodils will perfume the air of adventure. The beauty of flowers is in your walk.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31731.name: Costume Sweets Party
31731.description:
The confectioner went crazy and added a sliver of Perfect Emperium to the dough recipe for his sweets. The taste wasn't the best, but with these goodies floating around, everyone will know that you like a cookie. In fact, there's only one question left now: are they cookies or cookies? Hmm...
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31733.name: Illusory top hat
31733.description:
Don't let this hat fool you! The different shapes it adopts are pure illusion, fooling anyone who stares at it for too long. Has it turned into a truck and looks like it's going to crush you? Keep going and keep fighting!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31734.name: Fruit bow
31734.description:
Orange and with a scent of citrus fruits, this bow makes the surrounding aroma smell pleasantly sour.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31735.name: Yawata bottleneck
31735.description:
A powerful seal that was worn around a demon's neck to contain his immeasurable powers. After all this time, the spell has been broken, but the exotic style of the look remains!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31766.name: Peony ornament
31766.description:
A hair ornament made from peony petals, the flower of prosperity.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31785.name: Triton fins
31785.description:
Fins in the shape of fins inspired by a monster spotted on Byalan Island. It is said that there is an underwater temple hidden in the depths of that monstrous place.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31786.name: Red Dreggon Hat
31786.description:
A cute and cuddly dragon who loves to stay on your head. Watch out for the occasional flames!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31787.name: Shoulder Pig
31787.description:
A small, simple pig who keeps you company during the most dangerous adventures. Between one 'oinc' and another, he asks for affection and attention from those who carry him. Just don't get distracted by this cutie in the middle of battle!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31788.name: Costume Piamette Doll Hair (Silver)
31788.description:
The truth behind this wig is that Piamette got fed up with always being blonde and decided to change her look. Did she like it? We don't know... In any case, it's a very pretty wig.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31789.name: Turkey hat
31789.description:
A turkey in a hat has decided to sit on your head and now you need to stop it from growing so that it doesn't get too heavy for your neck.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31796.name: Legendary porpoise
31796.description:
A hat inspired by the legend of the Boto, who comes out of the Brasilis river to seduce women in love. "Your wife is beautiful, is she married?" - said the dolphin.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31797.name: Shih Tzu wig
31797.description:
A wig that copies the natural hair of King Tzu, well known to Oboros and Kagerous all over the world.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31798.name: Panda Companion
31798.description:
If having a pet wasn't enough of a joy, having a Panda Companion is a complete luxury. The animal is cute, doesn't bother anyone and even wipes out any other people's bamboo plantations... Not that there are many bamboo plantations around... Does it like dumplings?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31800.name: Laces of Hope
31800.description:
With the colors of Brazil, they bring all the Brazilian energy to adventures. Whether it's infecting your enemies with joy or never giving up, these bow ties prove your pride in our beloved nation.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31803.name: Wind Fold
31803.description:
Embrace the spirit of the four winds with this tornado that will envelop you completely. Avoid at ANY COST going near someone with a very cool hairstyle, after all, the worst thing is to have your updo interrupted by having to untangle your hair, right?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31813.name: Sympathetic Lunatic
31813.description:
Take a Lunatic with you on your shoulder, up close and personal. In fact, this one doesn't even need a Rainbow Carrot to tame!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31814.name: Lunatic balloons
31814.description:
Three Lunatic balloons that you just want to squeeze until they pop... But don't forget that they're balloons, so if you do that, you'll really pop these cuties. Iti malia!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31815.name: Hare Turkey
31815.description:
The ideal combination of a "modern" hairstyle and fluffy bunny ears. Combine style and cuteness in one look!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31816.name: Heavenly Rabbits
31816.description:
This beautiful scarf is divine, but its length might be a bit long for you. Lucky for you, these three flying rabbits will help you carry it!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31818.name: The Best Player
31818.description:
Special plaque for the most TOP players on the server! May glory and honor light your way!
--------------------------
^ff0000Please note! This item cannot be traded, dropped on the ground or placed in the cart, but it can be transferred to the warehouse.^000000
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31819.name: Invisible Head
31819.description:
After the invisible hat, the invisible glasses, the invisible mask and the invisible cloak... HERE IT COMES: the Invisible Head!
Perfect for hiding your ugly face!
Wear a pair of sunglasses and watch your friends get scared by the flying glasses right above your neck!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31821.name: Stylish cap
31821.description:
From the streets to the nightclub: this cap will keep you stylish and protected anywhere!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31823.name: Unrecognizable disguise
31823.description:
Blending into the crowd has many advantages. You can avoid autographs and unwanted photos, go on adventures without being interrupted and even collect rare loot in secret. However, anonymity has its price... Wait, who are you?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31831.name: Cloak of Disguise
31831.description:
The last adventurer who wore this mantle managed to hide from the obligations of adult life for a week... Then he had to catch up on everything. All things considered, the cloak is perfect for such escapades.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31833.name: Bad Kitty Short Wig
31833.description:
Used as an alternative to the Short Kitten Wig, this wig is made just for the naughtiest kittens out there. Feeling evil is sometimes momentary, so why not wear one of these?
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31840.name: Telemarketing phones
31840.description:
Similar to the "Fones da CurtiÃ§Ã£o", this version doesn't come with special effects. It's boring, like working in telemarketing, but we'll "be able" to sort it out.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31842.name: Admiral's protector
31842.description:
A very brave admiral decided to brave storms and gales to take supplies to all parts of the continent. On one occasion, his ship was swallowed up by the sea and the only thing that remained was his inseparable cap. To this day, the admiral's memories remain intact in his protector.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31844.name: Costume Mob Scarf
31844.description:
You know those unexpected encounters in the middle of the street? Running into that adventurer you've been talking to for hours? Going unnoticed becomes routine with the Disguise Scarf. It has a thousand and one uses besides hiding your face!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31845.name: Royal Guard top hat
31845.description:
A tall hat worn exclusively by the Prontera Royal Guard, inside the castle.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31846.name: Costume Hair Ribbon Wig
31846.description:
The only requirement for wearing this hairstyle is that you like bows. With not just one, but two, this hairstyle takes advantage of the contrast between blonde and red to adorn and highlight the wearer.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31847.name: Blue pupils
31847.description:
Wearing these lenses will make you feel so fabulous that you can't help but blink! With a beautiful shade of light blue, you'll be the center of attention at any party.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level Required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31848.name: Rose cap
31848.description:
Carry flowers on your head with the Rose Hat. As well as perfuming your hair, it enhances the shape of your face and beautifies your eyes. You can look good and avoid looking like a plant!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31850.name: Exuberant hat
31850.description:
The perfect hat to make you stand out from the crowd of adventurers who prefer an ordinary helmet or an unfashionable headgear. This hat can be a bit of a hindrance to vision and a bit warm, but what majesty doesn't have to make sacrifices, right?
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31851.name: Quantum Shield
31851.description:
Adapted with quantum floating technology, this shield protects you from external dangers and monster attacks. As a bonus, it provides acoustic insulation that filters out those friends who keep asking you to drop loots.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31852.name: Bow Cloak
31852.description:
The most starched cloak in the lot is here! With a stylish bow and details chosen by Rune-Midgard's top fashion professionals, this unique piece is just what fashion lovers need.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31853.name: Zombie mask
31853.description:
The perfect costume for Halloween! A stylish mask in the shape of a zombie! It comes with a distinctive undead stench.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31856.name: Court wig
31856.description:
The maidens of the Prontera court wore wigs to enhance their looks at important ceremonies. Over time, it became customary to wear them at all times and wigs became the trademark of the upper echelons.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31882.name: Chocolate skewers
31882.description:
A classic snack in Amatsu, these Chocolate Skewers are called PÃ³qui among the locals. The taste is nothing surprising, but it's a real treat.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Team on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31884.name: Purple Dragon Helmet
31884.description:
This scary helmet is sure to scare any opponent! Even an apprentice is much more intimidating wearing one of these, that's for sure. You can also use this helmet to scare little children who come to your door asking for candy on Halloween.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31885.name: Earth bending
31885.description:
Controlling the terrain allows you to open up previously impossible paths, move large boulders and hit your enemies in the face. Just be careful not to ruin the floors of the cities, eh?!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31887.name: Silk scarf
31887.description:
Comfortable and warm, the Silk Scarf is a favorite companion for those coming back from long journeys. A cup of soup, a fire and this scarf... You couldn't ask for more.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31902.name: Living Lens Glasses
31902.description:
Putting on these glasses is a path of no return... They say that the magic lenses decide for themselves where to look. Legend has it that the first person to come into harmony with the being that lives here will discover an immense source of power.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31905.name: Celestial Wig
31905.description:
When made, the wig was so identical in color to the sky that it amazed everyone who looked at it. Those who wore it boasted that they had captured a piece of the sky blue and put it on their head.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31906.name: Cute Kitten hat
31906.description:
This cap protects the wearer from the cold and also gives them a pompous look. There are reports that the wearer attracted all the Doram in the kingdom, making many new feline friends.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31907.name: Feline Hood
31907.description:
Everyone already knows that hats meow and now the Feline Hood has come to prove that it meows too! With this wonderful piece, it's impossible to have an adventure in complete silence. At any moment a random meow will come from the one covering your head!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31911.name: Costume Little Garden
31911.description:
Why have a huge garden at home when you can have a miniature one and take it anywhere? Using this will give you solid arguments when someone accuses you of planting around...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31912.name: Dark Veil
31912.description:
Dark and mysterious like the unknown. This veil is perfect for those who want to be part of the shadows. It's almost like invisibility... but it only works at night and the moon has to cooperate.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31915.name: Spiral wig
31915.description:
Marionette and Sohee's real hair combined with a dye found in the Full-Bodied Porings of Poring Village.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31916.name: Chic tie
31916.description:
To look chic at the last, this tie is just the thing! Its resistant and soft fabric combines with the contrast of black and white, embellishing one of the finest pieces ever worn.
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31923.name: Polar Baby
31923.description:
You may be wondering: how does this polar bear survive in all temperatures? He's actually a fluffy, mechanized robot, designed to be cuddly and accompany you on your adventures. Don't forget the daily cuddle!
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Required level: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31927.name: Blue colored pencils
31927.description:
A pencil created by "Fabre Castle". To achieve this coloration, several Fabres are fed blueberries to collect their bluish excrement. Unfortunately, someone bit this specimen.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31930.name: Microphone of the Stars
31930.description:
This microphone makes you feel just like Frederico MercÃºrio and it also has magical properties that help you scare away the monsters nearby. Looking like a music star is one thing, singing well is another...
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770 ^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

31931.name: Intellectual Lenses
31931.description:
Need to pass that difficult subject? Didn't understand the documentary? Were you the only one who didn't laugh at the joke? With Intellectual Lenses you can solve all these problems. You're smart. That's it, no secret!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31932.name: Necktie
31932.description:
For those of you who are unsure whether to wear a tie or a jacket? well, this is the perfect option. You don't have to take measurements or worry about tying the knot correctly. And if anyone asks what you're wearing, you always have the option of running away.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31933.name: Pink Miyabi wig
31933.description:
The classic, long wig of Amatsu's most beloved monster now in a PINK-HEARTED version!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31934.name: Purple Pupils
31934.description:
How about giving your look a makeover? Very nice, right? These beautiful Purple Pupils will add a special touch to your outfits!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All except Doram^000000

31937.name: Unicorn ornament
31937.description:
Whether it's to chide those who annoy you or to show your affection for unicorns, this adornment reminds you never to stop wearing something because of someone else's opinion. It's colorful and pretty, yes!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31938.name: Double braid wig
31938.description:
Blonde wig with two long braids. The strands are as strong as a rope and the coloring is bright, giving the accessory a silky feel.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31940.name: Gaia's mask
31940.description:
Created by a carnival artist from Brasilis, this golden mask with yellow feathers represents Mother Earth.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31943.name: Frog headdress
31943.description:
It's impossible not to be charmed by the Frog Headdress. The more you wear it, the more you pick up on the habits of the amphibians out there... But don't go trying to eat flies, eh?!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31946.name: Angry Eyes
31946.description:
Tired of not being intimidating? Equip those angry eyes and strike fear into anyone who dares to look at you!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Required level: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^7777All except Doram^000000

31947.name: Rocky Horns
31947.description:
The Rocky Horns are perfect for getting rid of anything that gets in your way. Just aim well and crack it down the middle! Just don't use it on your friends, okay? Not even inside cities, PLEASE!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

31950.name: Squirrel head
31950.description:
Become a true nut eater and spread the fluffiness of big cheeks throughout the kingdoms. Crumbs will fall, but your willpower will be as resilient as the squirrels' crunchy fruit.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Getting sucked into a portal every minute? No problem for this hat! The last ones to use the prop ended up meeting the Doram before the felines even showed up, almost spoiling the surprise.
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Upper^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Bright, eye-catching headphones. They say they make you stronger, which is true, because everyone knows that RGB lights on your equipment increase damage instantly!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Worn by those sworn to serve the nobles of Rune-Midgard, the Vassal's Collar is a fundamental piece of the kingdoms' history. Not only does it highlight the inequality between social spheres, but it also exposes a long-extinct tradition.

Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000

400195.name: Family Size Pizza with Stuffed Edge

I'd actually like to use this description to protest against those who complain about people who order mozzarella pizza. There's nothing wrong with ordering this flavor of pizza, even if it's a pizza without any other type of filling. Understand: sometimes you're not in the mood for Calabrian, Portuguese, pepperoni or any other flavor. You just want a pizza with lots of cheese and oregano to enjoy. So don't complain or judge people who order mozzarella pizza and, in protest, I've created this pizza-shaped hat.
Signed: Lord Kaho.

A robot trolley that was abandoned by one of the COR District's scientists. It looks like it was meant to carry golf clubs, but you can use it to go to the market to buy fruit. Its style seems to have been inspired by some robot assistant called Omega... there's a name written on the side, but it's smudged: V#rm#nt.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

410156.name: Colorful bouquet
410156.description:
A bouquet containing all the flowers from all the regions of Rune-Midgard. Wearing it at your wedding is said to bring good luck!
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

410157.description:
Do you always take the mushroom route because you never find a Lunatic? How about adopting two to ride with you?
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000

Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000

A great wizard once said: "The path can be found even in the darkest hours, if you remember to turn on the light", or something like that.

Let's go around scaring everyone, striking terror with this gang of greasy little deviruchizos. Everyone will run (or slip, be careful!).

At midnight she'll tell you a secret. Me, I'm more fearful than curious!

Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

Who gave a rabbit a tuxedo and a tray to serve tea?! I bet that's that Anisette's doing. Well, surprisingly he doesn't spill a drop while jumping!
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000

410201.description:
Who left the skulls out of the cage?! It's scary to find three skulls with green fire in the middle of the night! Fortunately, the master Necromancer has created a magic that controls them properly, so you can parade without worrying.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000

An electric scooter made by Pesla Industries, direct from Einbroch. It's quick, fast and comes with a poring! Just don't forget to recharge it often if you don't want to get stuck on the road.
-----------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771 ^000000
Classes: ^777777All ^000000

A future dragon king, still in his younger form. They say that a certain wizard of time can turn him into an Elder Dragon King, but that's the stuff of cartoons....
------------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000

Type: ^777777Costume ^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000

When Lelsa looked at her sister Mana, she turned her into a snowman called Alaf. Now everyone wants to copy that icy gaze of the Ice Queen. This story is true, there is a book by Waldisnei about this story being sold in the Prontera street market.
--------------------------
Type: ^777777Costume^000000
Equip on: ^777777Mid^000000
Weight: ^7777770^000000
Level required: ^7777771^000000
Classes: ^777777All^000000

The Viennese rabbit breed is known for its dark fur color. This bunny will be sure to accompany you on all your adventures!
--------------------------

Level required: ^7777771^000000

Type: ^777777Costume^000000

410248.description:
Tuk Tuk. Could it be the tire? Tuk Tuk. What happened? Tuk Tuk. Oh dear, but I took it to Jubilee's mechanics. Tuk Tuk. By the beard of Odin, I know what happened. Tuk Tuk wasn't a fault. Step on it! A Vesper is coming, for God's sake!!! aaaah!!!

In the depths of Mount Mjolnir, there was a race of cats that needed to reach the top of the gigantic flowers in order to hunt. Over time, this race grew to the same size as the flowers of Mjolnir and so they became gigantic feline creatures.

Tollynho is your little friend!
He'll be by your side in good times and bad!
Tollynho is a chocolate drink with a high alcohol content, but very adventurous!
Will people look at you strangely for talking to an inanimate bottle? They will! But you'll never be alone again^0000ffsober^000000!

This spiked collar makes the wearer look tough, scaring the bejeezus out of anyone! But it's not just a fashion accessory, it's also very useful on the battlefield, protecting a vital part of the warrior's body, the neck. Who would dare sniff a neck with this collar on? Not me.

A chocolate-scented, candy-colored bow tie. Although it's not edible, it's a big seller because of its light, semi-sweet scent. It's not fattening!

Equip on: ^777777Lower^000000

420028.description:
A silver and gold shoulder pad with lots of details, awarded only to the bravest warriors! Many covet it, but only those who have won great glory on the battlefield have the right to wear it. Because it's made of Mithril, it's very light and makes it easy to move around during battles.

Holding it in your mouth makes a whistle-like sound.
Increases ranged physical damage by 5%.

The highest honor for knights who have faced the greatest monsters and defended the integrity of the kingdom. They say the cape is so big that it hits the ground and gets dirty easily... There had to be a downside, right?
